choices: Head to your work, the Zoo.
1.content:
You are about to head to bed. You are the middle child of a family of 9, with an older brother just out of college, two younger brothers, one 7, the other 12, and three sisters, one 8, the middle being 14, and one oder than you at 17.

Everything in life just isn't right to you. You are fairly tall, about 6'2", so it is really awkward at school with everyone shorter than you, and then, at home, everyone everyone except your younger brothers and youngest sister are taller than you, even your 14 year old sister beats you out by an inch.

You go to sleep, and you have a weird dream. You are floating in space, while this elf-like creature appears before you. He bellows out in a voice deeper than anything you have ever heard

"I am the god of size. I can change the size of anyone I want. However, I have a good number of restrictions on my powers. The other gods don't let me do much. However, I can give some of my power to other people, as long as at the end of their life I clean everything up. I have decided to give my power to you. You have an awkward life, one of the most awkward I have seen, so I am giving you part of my power. Feel free to do what you want with it. Just don't screw up the universe too badly in the process."

You are surrounded by a weird light, and once it disappears, you wake up. Hoping maybe it wasn't just a dream, you decide to test it on yourself.

You grow yourself by a foot. You are now very close to your ceiling, and you can see the furniture around the room changing size, as well as the clothes around the room. You also see things added to your room, like instead of a ceiling fan, you have a desk fan, most likely due to a constant habit of having your head smacked by the fan.

You walk down stairs, and see your mom. She comes up to you, and says, "So how is my big boy this morning?"

You are taken aback by the fact you can see over your mom's head, as you never could before. "Uh, fine."

She goes back to drinking her tea, and you...
1.title: The Power of Universal Change, with size.

choices: You are greeted by your friends.
You are greeted by your teammates.
11.content:
It is a weekday, so you head to school. Besides, you want to see what everything is going to be like for you now. You never were very popular, and you only had a handful of friends, and only a few more who you actually knew.

You enter school and...
11.title: School Day

choices: Grow/Shrink an animal/plant/object that's in the vicinity.
111.content: Your friends greet you and you tell them you want to show them something special afterschool. Once your school session is over, you show your friends to the football field. How do you show them your ability to start out with?
111.title: You are greeted by your friends.

1111.content: Would you like to grow or shrink in front of your friends?
1111.title: Grow/Shrink

11111.content:
"Dude," you say to your friends. "I found out today I have this weird superpower that changes the size of stuff. Let me show you."

You concentrate and make yourself grow another foot. This morning you were six foot two, now two feet taller, being the tallest person in the country.

Your friends look at you as if they expected something. "Well?" one of them asked.

"Didn't you see?" you tell him. He says otherwise. You tell him you made yourself grow about another foot, and that you grew a foot this morning, but they leave, telling each other that you were crazy.

You finally understood. No one was supposed to notice the changes that happened during changes in size. A warm feeling resonates through your body immediately after the thought crossed your mind.

The football field was empty. Would you like to use your power here, alone, or go home?
11111.title: Awkward...

111112.content:
It was easier to walk in your new size, with strides as long as NBA players. You arrived home early, and noticed a change. The front door stretched as tall as the first floor, making it easy for you to walk in. You would have to squeeze through a normal-sized door at your size.

"Welcome home, honey," your mom says as you walk in. You notice your youngest brother, Tommy, age 7, watching cartoons. It would be fun to mess with him, you thought, remembering you can change the size of others. Do you want to grow or shrink him?
111112.title: Go home

choices: Shrink him down to a very small size, 6 inches or smaller
1111122.content:
You sit down next to Tommy and see that, like your friends, he doesn’t take any notice to your new size. You decide to shrink him. Tommy is tall like the rest of your family and is an impressive 5’1”. You decide to shrink him down a few inches at first, to 4’9” just to see if he notices something. He doesn’t seem to, and his clothes have shrunk with him.

“Hey Tommy.” You say. The now shorter boy looks at you.
“Yeah?” He asks. You just shake your head and shrug. Tommy goes back to his show. You decide that you should shrink Tommy some more. You concentrate and make him a foot shorter, the average 7 year old height. Yet again, Tommy doesn’t notice anything. Then you decide to...
1111122.title: Shrink

11111222.content:
You decide to leave the room go find another sibling to shrink. As you walk through your house, you see all the doors are bigger.

You then see your 8 year old sister Jessica playing by herself in her room. Across the hall, your 17 year old sister Penny is talking on the phone. Who do you shrink and to what size?
11111222.title: Shrink any other sibling.

1113.title: An animal, a plant, or an object?

11131.title: Animal

111311.content: You decide on a good size to make it...
111311.title: Make a bigger crow.

choices: They want to ride on this colossal crow.
1113112.content:
"All right, everyone. You will be amazed for sure. See that crow? It will be more than that in just a second."
You look toward the crow and it slowly starts expanding in size until it can't grip the goal post, so it jumps off and keeps growing until it's 20 feet tall.

Your friends are totally amazed. "Did you make that happen?" one of them said.

You say, "Yes. I gained the ability to change size of things."

The crow sees how big it has become and decides to walk over to you and your friends. The crow turns out to still be harmless as you and your friends gather around it and stroke its feathers.

So...what happens next?
1113112.title: 20 feet tall.

111312.content: You see a butterfly on the grass, you want to grow that?
111312.title: Butterfly?

choices: Make it as big as Mothra (300 foot wingspan)
1113121.content: You grow the butterfly. It slowly gets bigger as everyone else stares in awe. After a few seconds, it's as big as an eagle, then gets even bigger, to the size of a jet plane. You then decide to...
1113121.title: Bigger Butterfly

choices: Shrink the butterfly from fear of the damage it could cause.
11131211.content:
You decide jet plane size is big enough. You were surprised to see that your friend's actually seemed to notice the growth as nobody else had so far when you had made changes. You look from the giant, what would now be considered 'regular' butterfly to your friends to see that they no longer have looks of shock and excitement on their faces but are instead treating it as normal. You figure reality must have needed a few minutes to catch up as they actually saw the change.

"Aren't they beautiful?" Melissa, one of your female friends asks.

"I guess so, but are they safe?" you ask in response as you start to eye the butterfly suspiciously. At the moment it is simply sat on the grass with its wings open bathing in the sun.

"If we don't get too close then sure. I wonder what it's doing here. They don't usually stray from the feeding stations."

"Feeding stations?" This seems like information you should know.

"Uh, yeah," Joe, another friend pipes in, "You know, those large tower structures you see on the horizons everywhere. It's not like they're new or anything."

" I guess not," you say. You wonder if you should keeps things like this or not. Nobody seems to mind them too much and have even built 'feeding stations' to keep them under some level of control. You wonder what might happen though if the saying about when a butterfly flaps its wings it starts a hurricane on the other side of the world were true.

"Come on," you hear Joe saying, "We best leave it alone. Someone will come to sort it sooner or later".

Before you leave you decide to...
11131211.title: Stop the Growth

11131212.content:
You had made the moth quite big already, but then, you thought of Mothra, the kaiju moth. As such, you decide to make the insect as big as the kaiju. Given it was growing again, your friends cautiously walks back onto a more safe distance, since the moth was getting quite the bit of place. Seeing it started to grow bigger than the buildings, your friends started to grow weary and scared, before their visage started to look neutral again, as it started to be changed into the reality. One of them sighs, visibly not quite happy to see the moth, but without any hint of fear anymore. What actually bothered you was the youngest's reaction: He was bolstering a large smile and was visibly marveled at the sight, confirmed as he exclaims, 'Woah! So cool!'. You couldn't be help but being shocked at his reaction, given you couldn't tell whenever it was because of the moth, or if he noticed that you enlarged the insect with your powers. You were about to ask about that when one of the friends says, 'Billy, are you alright..?'. Out of surprise, you stutter, 'B-but... T-the moth..!'.

Thankfully, the insect was peacefully basking in the sun, just behind you, meaning you could speak freely, when you feel a change in your mind. For whatever the reasons, a few parts of your memories had blurred out, without being really impactful nor meaningful whatsoever, and, before you could go through your mind, the youngest says, 'I never thought thoses actually existed at that size, given i've only seen them in movies, especially that remake of an old movie.. Err.. What it was..?.. Oh yeah! "Mothra returns"!'. You thought said movie would be actually called 'Godzilla returns', but rather than to point out mere details, you prefer to disregard it. Then, one of the other boys says, 'Of course they do. It's just that the huge ones are pretty rare, at least, near cities. I wonder why this one's here though. There's not a lot of flowers for him to feed off. At least, not of the huge ones. Insects sure loves thoses ones.'. Giant flowers!? Although, in a sense, it does make sense, given the moth has to feed somehow.. Then, one of the boys add, 'I wonder if this moth actually befriended someone. I heard thoses would managed to befriended one of thoses were considered as being among the luckiest. But then, even smaller insects makes fine pets too! I might even have a slug if i work well at the school.'. You couldn't be helped but blinking. 'Wouldn't it be better to have a cat or a dog instead..?'. The comment caused your friends to go into an awkward silent.

They finally break up the silence by implying, 'You're sure that you didn't felt off your bed..?', 'Why?', 'Because we never heard of 'cats' and 'dogs'. That statement made wonder if you still had your faithful dog waiting at your house or not.
Regardless,...
11131212.title: Insect-human world. With Mothra?

choices: Grow one (or more) of the moths.
111312121.content:
The moth had apparently befriended you, given her actions. You could even tell that it was a female despite your lack of knowledge, at least, from before the change. And that she wanted you to ride her, seemingly.
Your friends, out of shock, yells, 'WOAH! SO COOL!'. You ask, 'Why she's doing that..?', 'Why are you playing dumb?', 'Why..?', 'You told us that you met her years ago.', 'That's why Billy's garden's so big?', 'Yeah. And if she's here, it means it worked?'' You ask, 'What worked..?', 'The plantation! Which try it was..?', 'Fourth!'. Something tilts in your head as you sudden had the feeling that you should head back at home with the moth. As such, you say, 'It was certainly nice to see you guys again, but then, i need to leave.', 'Yeah, don't worry! We'll tell the teachers'. You smile, and, without the need to say anything, the moth lowers herself so you could actually ride her. 'Don't forget that tomorrow, we do our homework together, okay?', 'Oh.. Hum.. Y-yeah! Sure..!'. What they says surprise you, making a solitary tear running onto your cheek, 'Don't, change Billy.. Okay?'. Then, before you could actually add anything, the moth flies away with you, while your friends waves toward you.

The flight to your home was pretty much uneventful, but when you actually have it in sight, you notice that, while your home was the same as before, the garden is as big as a small park, thanks to the towering tree-flower. It's trunk is roughly as wide as the wingspan of the moth, 300ft, its height turning around 2000 ft, and its flower being 1600 ft wide. The moth let you go down onto the ground before it flies onto the tree-flower, leaving you the time to go into your room so you could get your computer. On your way there, you notice some family photoes, especially one of them that caught your attention. On it, you see yourself, your parents, your brothers and sisters, your moth friend and a brown spider, roughly dog-sized. You wonder why she wouldn't be a dog without knowing why and shrug it off, given there was a few things you wanted to know. You lead outside and start to do some research on internet when you feel moth going down and laying on the ground behind you. You wiggle your body and make yourself comfortable on her.

Apparently, cats and dogs didn't existed anymore, so did most non-insect furred mammals, excluding predators, remplaced by more insects, some having gotten bigger over time. Birds weren't existing either, changed into their feathered arthropod counterparts. On the other hand, reptiles and amphibians, such as frogs, snakes, and crocodiles, were untouched, and same for the aquatic wildlife, if you exclude the fact that there is plenty more of aquatic insects living in the lakes, rivers, and oceans.
For food, the eggs, milk and meat mostly came from insects, with supplements from the aquatic wildlife, such as fish. Funnily enough, and even then human regularly eat insect meat, eating bug-class insects, thoses who were still at their normal size, is still considered as being gross.

After that, you search more information on the oversized moth. It turns out that, not only moths can get into the kaiju, or titan, class size, more or less the gigantic insects. Even if, statistically wise, the kaiju-class moths are more prolific and bigger on average than the other kaiju-class insects. It also seems that all kaiju-class insects have the possibility of making special bonds with other living beings, including humans, and excluding other kaiju-class insects.
In your case, you had first met the moth when she was still in her coccoon, when you were only 9-years old. You were always curious about why some of the insects would change so much, and, as such, tried to understand why, by actually trying to wishstand the situation and finding them. One day, you had found her, and, out of curiosity, you touched the silky protection. Apparently, you had fainted out afterwise, and that, when you were rescued and woke up, the newly hatched insect was already guarding you. Since then, you were like the best buddies in the world, until your family moved out for a more properly suited home for the whole family. Thankfully, you and your family could have sold the silk, being not needed nor used anymore. Unlike regular silk, or even its higher quality counterpart, the silk from the kaiju-class ones was highly prized, selling even more than gold! As such, your family could their new property with ease, including their home and garden. The only problem was that, to allow the moth to live with you, it would need at least one tree-flower nearby in town, and, given the conditions to actually grow and keep one alive, you couldn't pass all the time you wanted with your friend and familiar, until now.
Lastly, the rest of what you wanted to gather was about your moth friend. As she started at a wingspan size of 120 ft, she grew with you as you did, meaning she'd reach, in thoery, 400 ft within 5 years, before she'd reach her mature size. Also, there was a name. The moth's name is "Xialamelya".

Now that you feel like all you wanted to know, you want to try that bond, without undoing your work. So, you try to shrink down the tree-flower, but feel a resistance as you do. You blink and notice what actually occured: Rather than to size the size of the tree-flower, another one, around 60% as tall as the present one, had sprouted in the garden! Also, two things were different.. Xialamelya had a family herself, and the bond you shared with her had been reinforced. Knowing that, you decide to..
111312121.title: The moth friendily headrubs you!

choices: Oooops too much 25 FT Tall or more ( Oh well just let her stay that way )
1113122.content:
You look around and spot a little girl about 6 years old in a school uniform being bullied by a few boys about 9 or 10 years old. She has brown hair and blue eyes and seems kind of short for age. You and your friends watch and can hear the bullies.

"Ha Little Lucy is such a lame little runt. Does the wittle baby need help reaching her things" teased one of the boys hold her Hello Kitty backpack upside down above her.

"Why those little brats. Im gonna give them a piece of my mind" said one of you friends before you stop him.

"No watch this instead" you say.


You then make the little girl grow to....
1113122.title: A little girl

11131222.content: The next thing you know, there was a loud crash and you feel a heavy object push you onto the ground. As the dust and debris leaves your vision, you find yourself starring up at the little girl you decided to grow earlier! She was quite shocked to see the world so small right before her, and she didn't even notice your helpless form trapped under her shoe. How tall was she?
11131222.title: Oh no!

111312221.content:
After you gave a scared look at the newly grown girl, you think you inadvertly grew her to around 5000 feet. The main problem was that the girl was so shocked of the sight her new size gave her that she didn't moved for a few minutes, for the time to aknowledge that it was the reality.

Unfortunately, you couldn't keep your fear in check for what felt eons as you lose the control of your powers and..
111312221.title: 5,000 feet tall!

1113122211.content:
As your mind lost track of your powers, your thoughts inadvertly drifted toward your sisters and the girls you befriended. Soon after, you could hear more heaving stomping throughout the whole town, as shadows grows up and omniously looms. A few quick checks tells you that not only all the grown girls were bigger than the one standing on you, but you could also tell that you *knew* them.

Thankfully, the girl that had you pinned down under her shoe finally moves out, seemingly to join the other girls, and could hear some loud girly gigglings.

Given a troup of titanic girls roaming around would certainly not be without consequences, you decide to..
1113122211.title: Grow things.

choices: Ask them if you can join them. (And maybe mess up things with your powers.)
11131222111.content:
A nearby television behind the glass cover of a random nearby shop was suddenly sporting a breaking news: Seemingly, a military experimentation about a potent growth substance had been leaked after a disastrous tremor, letting it flow away into water tanks. Most of it was gotten back, but some of it somehow ended up into the drinks of the girls nearby. Scientists brings up some kind of graphic that would should what would be the potential effects of said unknown substance. Strangely enough, some of it had also leaked into the earth, and from their estimations, it would cause the earth to grow as well, which would more or less make the planet five time as big. Almost like it was mean to allow giga giantesses to live well.

You couldn't believe the unit that was used, given it went up to two digits.. [i]*of miles*![/i] for the girls, and soon after, you could feel another stomping.. But much stronger than before. All the present girls were growing taller before you, quickly getting past the mile milestone, while they knelt down, grinning and giggling as they see the town getting smaller and smaller, all of it, while leaving humongous craters. Soon, though, their pretty quick and sudden growth came to an end. And by what you could tell, they were around 25 and 80 miles tall. But given even the smallest of the girl's feet were over 5 miles long, even the town looked like but a mere speck to them.

Suddenly, you snap of your staring of the colossal girls as you remember that they said that the earth grew as well, meaning there would be potentially structural damage to all the surroundings buildings. But, to your surprise, there were.. Seemingly only minimal damages left. And, given how it looks, it felt like they were expecting it as most of the city had gone under major repairs.

The news were still being broadcasting as you see what looked like a huge.. Temple? It was hard to tell given the angle.. That they says it is their new home, so the newly grown giantesses doesn't try to bring destruction to the planet. Then, they also said they settled up a communication line, so people could actually acts with them. And, given you knew the girls, you rush at your home, hoping you could actually inquire from them how they were feeling.

Given some of the girls were your sisters, your home had been furnished with a special access to their line. And, as such, you decide to..
11131222111.title: Notice something was wrong.

choices: Grow yourself to the girl's size so you can do things with her.
111312222.content:
After you gave a scared look at the newly grown girl, you think you inadvertly grew her to around 10000 feet. Thankfully, her shoes had grew as well, leaving you lucky as you were merely stuck onto one of the sole's hole pattern, meaning you would be able to escape as she move out, visibly not bothered anymore by her size anymore.

You couldn't be helped to look at the massive 6-year girl and notice that her school uniform, while still being the same size for her, is awfully short around the hips.. You blush at the sight and lower your eyes down when you notice some kind of statue that looks strangely similar to the grown girl. While it wasn't nearly as big as her, the statue was still an impressive structure of steel, standing at around 240 ft, and onto the bottom of which, a commemorative plaque was found, saying 'To our Defender and greatest friend, the symbol of peace and friendship.'.

It would also seem that the town was seemingly rebuilt so a titan could pass through, while most the buildings were still meant for normal-sized beings. All of which, were towered by a humongous construction of what seemed like a pink manor. On top of it was standing a statue that looked like a huge turtle, with the description of 'Gamera'. Apparently, the girl was fan of kaijus and, much like her idol, she was protecting the earth. So, given the situation, you decide to..
111312222.title: 10,000 feet tall!

choices: 'Don't worry..' (Remain as a pink kaiju, being the girl's sis, with a new life.)
'I don't think i should..' (The girl sigh and help you undo the change.)
1113122221.content:
You decide that you would roughly grow to the girl's size, while being slightly smaller, so you wouldn't inadvertly change the world as it is. You also decide that you woudn't grow yet, given you doubt that you would be able to dodge the statue if you were bigger. You walk off, toward the manor.

You notice that the place is actually some kind of large park, with fountains, benches, patches of grass, flowers and tree. There is even some birds that were chirping! But, surprisingly enough, it was empty of human presence. Only a few stands could be found around. You understand quickly enough, afterwise, as you spot a large signboard. A date is on it, seemingly for 2 weeks later. It says, 'Commemoration of the kaiju exposition! For all the family, small and big! And maybe you will be able to reveal the kaiju that is within you! More information at the town hall.'.

You continue on your way when you notice representations, made of tiles, of kaijus and monsters, most in situations where they are shown as good and/or gentle. The rest, shown as evil, are represented being beaten. The most surprising, though, is a representation of a pink-scaled godzilla, wearing a bikini that support a nice pair of breasts. You couldn't be helped but smirk at it, given she was doing a V-shaped symbol with her fingers as a greeting.

Considering that there isn't anyone or anything around that you could damage and/or harm, you decide grow up. After all, the girl is nowhere in sight and there is still a long way to the manor. You focus your powers onto yourself, after you relax yourself, given you weren't in a rush. As you grow up, you close your eyes, not really bothering to watch the changes, given you didn't wanted to change things, nor to bother with what wouldn't.

When you finally reach a size of 9500 ft, you stop your growth and peer around the town. While no buildings would be even close to the manor's size, even if you compared the manor to a house, you notice that some of the buildings are bigger than they should, making you wondering if you didn't made more things bigger because of your mishap. Regardless, you decide to shrug it off, given you goal is the manor.

You finally make it to what seem to be the main entrance of the manor, at least, from what you can see. The walls and pillar, while still pink, weren't of an overly aggressive shade. More implying to soothe people, rather than to be a girl's whim.
You move toward the large double wooden, and as you stand in front of them, you were about to knock at the doors, when they open up on their own.

Very cautiously, you step in the manor, to check if anyone was behind. No one. And far from reassuring you, it actually scares you, given you have no idea of what would occur. But, given what you wanted to know, you decide to steel your nerves and peer around.

The room looks like a large main hall, with a huge stair, made of marble, standing in the room, leading to an upper floor. More doors can be seen around the floor you currently stand, leading to unknown locations.

Two statues stands in the room. One on the left, and one on the right. The statue on the right represents Godzilla, oversized compared to its 'normal' size, but still smaller than you. The thing that bothers you about it, though, is its sheer amount of details and realism. You'd swear it could suddenly move, or jump and fight.
The statue on the left also represents Godzilla, but with a scaled pink skin, looking strangely similar to the one you saw back in the park. Weirder even, the statue looks like some kind of plush.
The statue/plush bolsters a black bikini, supporting a healthy pair of D-cup breasts, a slightly chubby belly, as well as a large backside, on which stands a thick, heavy and long tail. The tail is as thick as the chest, and longer than the whole body. You could also swear it looks like more an anthropomorphic hybrid than a dinosaur, given its arms looks like one of a human, while her legs, looking more reptilian and digitigrade in shape, are long and thin, much like an atheltic female human.

You were about to explore the rest of the manor, when you felt compelled by the statue/plush. Disregarding common sense, you walk toward it, when you notice a post-it on it, saying, 'Big Sis!'.
A peer to its back reveals a zip, implying that the statue/plush is actually a costume, maybe for cosplay? But then, why it is as tall as you? It wouldn't fit the girl. You feel like you should wear the costume, but prefer to ignore that, given you have no idea of what would occur.

You were about to resume your exploration, when you hear the voice of a girl. Turning around, you notice that it was the girl that you had grown previously. Given you didn't hear what she said, you had no idea of what she meant. But before you can do anything, the girl says, 'What are you going to do?'. The question is odd, given you entered in, probably without authorization, yet, you thought of the costume standing behind you. Feeling an urge even stronger than before to wear it, you turn back, and unzip it, so you can wear it. Surprisingly, you smoothly wear, when you heard a zipping sound, while the post-it disappear.

You run your hands on your back, trying to unzip the costume, when you feel a warm wave going through your body. The costume started to feel tight, as.. Your feeling started to shift. Starting with the hands, you idly rub then, and shiver. You could feel the rub, like the scaled skin was your own! The feeling spreads over your whole body, causing you to feel a weight dragging you down when it hit the breasts and tail, a temporary hearing loss when it hit the head, and makes you fall down when it struck the legs.

Then, some kind of powers goes in your veins, causing your heart to beat frantically, and you to breath heavily. Your body, now being the pink anthro dinosaur, grows up, until you reach a size of 13000 ft. An impressive growth on its own, but a mere inches gain from your size. After your heart calms down, you manage to stand up, noticing that the previously heavy tail was now like part of you, as nimble as your body, despite its weight.

The girl had been watching all along, and she was now crying. And, when you stood up at your new size, she ran toward you, jumping on you, and hugging you as tightly as she could. She whimpers, 'Big sis! You're finally back..'. At first, you blink, and remain still, shocked. But, eventually, you end up hugging the little girl back, not wanting her to remain sad. You even gently rub her head and says, 'Don't worry..'. The girl's cry wear off and get slowly remplaced by a smile.

The little girl say, 'Hey. Big sis.. Will you remain like that?'. 'What do you mean..?'. 'I know that you can.. Undo the change..but you won't, right? Even if i would accept it if you would.. I-i could always try to make more friends..'. You sigh, then you say..
1113122221.title: Visit at the pink kaiju manor.

11133.content:
You kicked your shoes off and sat your socks near them in the muddy field, they gave you questioning looks.

Concentrating on your shoes/ankle socks, you grew them to the width of the football field, soon they took up 4 football fields and were 350ft. long, though you fought to keep yourself normal.

"how'd you do that!" your friends asked looking at the shoes and then you, though you were a little busy trying to keep yourself small and everything unchanged. In the end however, you fail. Everything shrinks around you, you go skywards and your friends get caught at the toes of your enormous mud-coated, sweaty feet. However, they don't recall you being this large, by chance, your change in the universe happened a second ago. In the distance, you see some truck carrying a large ray that appears to have struck you, though now the cannon was in pieces.

At 8400 feet tall, you figure its best to sit down and rescue your friends from their 150 foot tall prison. Carefully sitting down cross legged, you think on how best to extract the tiny creatures and eventually just stick a finger between each toe, one at a time. Once everyone's out, you set them down on your knee and find that civilized conversation will take a while, all you hear of the milimeter tall specks is angry yells and your straining your ears to hear that! Of course, if you'd just gotten a close up with your friends toes like that, you'd be angry too.. Eventually....

You tell them what happened and all about your new powers, they...
11133.title: Object

choices: Grow your friends up! More eyes up ahead would make the truck's spotting easier.
Agree with your friends and seek the unknown truck.

1121112.content:
Your head was still spinning, swimming with the rapid changes you'd caused, the whole of the world buckling under the unbridled power you'd accidentally given to a single prepubescent teenaged boy. As much as you wanted, no . . . as much as you NEEDED to fix this, you couldn't do so without first knowing more about this world. You could easily make things worse before they got better.

Getting out of the city to get a better look at the situation was your first priority. You managed to 'borrow' a dirt bike to ride to the city's edge, only a few one story houses now blocking your view of the titanic teenager that dominates most of the sky. Even while he sat there, motionless, his scraggly hair half hidden from view by clouds as they whisped past him, either inhaled by his breath or caused by them.

Your voice cracked as you tried calling up to him, the name on the tip of your tongue . . . damn. His name was already lost to you as your memories re-knit themselves. You can only remember him as your god.

It scarcely mattered now though. You revved the bike and drove closer yet, maneuvering around the 'danger' signs that marked the road you'd chosen as destroyed by the giant. Within a few more miles, the road had ceased to exist. A single crater of a footprint, hundreds of feet deep blocked your path now. Half buried cars, crushed like aluminum foil under his tread, were barely visible, intermingled with pulverized stone from the remnants of the road. Undeterred, you drove the bike down into the crater and across the footprint, emerging on the other side with a soft gasp.

His foot had shifted, those five enormous pink toes now filling the horizon before you, the ground soft and squishy under your feet from the constant presence and pressure of the miles tall giant looming overhead. That's when you realized he was looking right at you, despite the fact that you were so small in comparison you may as well have been a flea.

"Huh. Apparently you people don't get the 'stay out of my land' rule still. There's a GOOD reason I demolished all those roads." The god-boy lurched to his feet suddenly, the ground beneath you rippling like a wave under the change in pressure, knocking you from your bike as you looked straight up at the dozens of miles of clothes-free teenager.

You swallowed the lump in your throat, your head spinning as he leered down at you, his open palm filling more of your vision as he reached towards you and your overturned ride.

Why was it he destroyed all those roads again?

11211121.content:
"I don't want to put you people in any more danger!" You froze at the revelation. a memory strikes you. You remember now...

------------------------
"Billy? What are you doing here?" Andy asks you with an odd mix of fear and happiness plastered on his face. You are both seven years old.
"Andy, can you come play yet? I haven't played soccer in a long time." You smile at your innocence at the time. This was the year things went sour for the entire world. Andy was once a normal kid. If anything, he was a little on the short side for his age, while you towered over all the other kids.
"Sorry Billy," Andy answered with a pout. "Mommy says I can't because the doctor said so. He said I have to stay inside until they can make me all better again." Billy crosses his arms with a huff. It wasn't fair you thought at the time. Nothing looked wrong with Andy. he looked healthy.
"But why?" you whine. Andy looks down. His body begins to tremble. you remember feeling a little scared. Andy looks back up at you. You might have thought you were seeing things at the time, but now you knew better; Andy was growing right before your eyes.
"Billy," Andy begins while you stand frozen in fear, "can you keep a secret?" You nod your head enthusiastically. Andy smiles a bit before you trembles again, growing ever so much faster. "The doctor says I'm very special. He says I'm gonna be real big someday like, a gajilllion feet high. But..." Andy begins to grow even faster. You remember a sense of fear flowing throughout your body as you see your best friend's clothes tear off his expanding body. "...I don't wanna be big."
Andy looks down at you. DOWN at you. A look of realization spreads across his face. That's when it goes black.
------------------------
You are brought back to the present . You look around you and see only a flesh color all around you.
"...and you people insist oncoming to see me! Leave me alone! It's for your own good!" You can sense the sadness in his voice. You can hear how hard he is trying to mask it with a sound of anger, but he fails miserably. He begins to set you down, when you start to wave your arms wildly. In this reality, Andy was your best friend. And you'll be damned if you leave your best friend when he needs a shoulder to lean on... metaphorically of course.
"WAIT! Andy! Look at my face! It's me, Billy! Wait! I need to talk to you!!!!!" You try desperately to get his attention. He almost doesn't see your miniscule movements. Luckily for you, however, he does. He looks confused, but he brings his face closer to yours. You can feel his hot breath on your body. It's so powerful, you almost fall down. He notices this, and elongates his breaths, so as to hold more air for longer periods of time. He studies you with the most intense eyes. You keep still, as to allow him to get a good look at you. His eyes squint, but then widen, is if he realized something. He opens his mouth and speaks in an oddly quiet voice.
"...Billy... is that you...." he asks in a shaky voice, as if he was afraid of being told no.
"Yes! Yes Andy it's me! You're best friend" You feel the tears running down your face, but you don't care. You have reunited with your best friend, who everyone else labeled as an angry, bloodthirsty god. He tilts his head and cups a hand to his ear. 'oh, right,' you think to yourself. 'I'm to small for him to hear me.'
"Billy...if that is you... could you run to the right? Your right, not mine!" You begin to laugh. You sprint as well as you can to the right of the hand of the massive giant teenager, who you note is beginning to shake. You look up into the face of the young giant, who has tears running down his face.
"It is you Billy! It is you!" He's full on sobbing now. you wish you could hug him or comfort him. Your friend is broken and it's all your fault. He lifts you up to his face and "hugs" you (or press you to his giant cheek, either one works). He falls to his knees, destroying more of the crumbling street.
"Billy. I missed you so much." he continues to sob. You can feel the water works too, as tears roll down your face. He pulls you away from his face, laughing shakily. "Wait, let me take you to the radio tower. They have a speaker there that is loud enough for me to hear. It's... err...abandoned now, so you shouldn't have trouble finding the intercom. Come one. I'll be extra safe with you, i promise."
--------------
"Andy, I missed you!" You speak into the microphone. You found it easy enough, and it was still in working order. Andy's eye fills the window in front of you. It's watering, as if he's still crying.
"I missed you too little guy. I missed you too." You and Andy had been repeating that same phrase for at least five minutes. You can feel the vibrations run through the building. "Wait, why are you here? I told everyone to leave. It isn't safe around me anymore..." you can feel the sadness in his voice. Like, you can actually feel it. The vibrations were actually running through your body. You lean into the microphone.
"I wanted to see my best friend." He starts to cry again. The building shakes gently with him.
"...I'm still you best friend?" You smile.
"Forever and always dude."
"...Even though I can kill you with a sneeze...?"
"Yes, you'd be my best friend if you grew another head, too." He laughs. You laugh. Pretty soon, you're both on the floor laughing. Andy leans back to fill the window.
"I'd hug you if you weren't so small."
"I'd hug you if you weren't so big. But, we'll settle for smothering my body against your cheek. A laugh escapes Andy. He turns solemn soon after.
"But... isn't it dangerous to be around me? Shouldn't you be far away from me? I'm sure all the people are afraid of their so-called 'god of wrath.'" You can sense the anger in his voice.
"Andy, living in a stable house is dangerous. And i have no problem living in one of those. Now, if you're trying to get me to leave, I will. But if you want me to stay, I'll do that too. Take your pick."

112231.content:
Sitting by your team on the flipflop, you by pure chance caught them talking history, specifically how people got like this...

A few hundred years ago, people discovered genetics and immediately began to change strings all over. By sheer accident, they created a virus which would cause the reduction in size of any who contracted it. The disease attacked genes that regulated cell sizes and the base form of cells altogether. Some people however were completely immune and could only carry it, midgets and the shorter people. Anyone born normal was safe until puberty, then they were fair game. Born to a carrier an not immune, you'd be tiny one way or another.

Laws were enacted that any carriers walk around in isolation suits. The virus lived only minutes beyond their body and spread by touch. So long as they didn't touch people, the disease would not spread and eventually, die out. For a great while, this plan worked, until modern times. The 'big people' teased the shrimps, not everyone but a few. Some got angry and started to take their vengance until it became common place.

Your team had all teased Rick, until on one occasion he couldn't take it and got his revenge. He enjoyed the next days and weeks, watching his tall friends dwindle in size until they could not even see beyond his toes, until a single muscle was miles of it. Your homes and things grew into miles as did your 'little' siblings, who got their fair deal of pay backs too.

The law in the end stated that Rick would have to keep watch of you and that he would have to move to an isolation city, no longer capable of being trusted around normal people. That is where you all were now and why he wasn't in an isolation suit. Welcome to life where even a little kids 100 miles tall.

choices: Tag along. (And maybe go onto a growing fun.)
Find a way to shrink the lizard sisters.
1332321.content:
You decide to grow the lizard, poked by two girls, but at a careful pace. That way, you would be able to revert the growth if anything goes wrong, you would see the changes at a tranquil pace and you would be able to focus onto more things if you wanted to, like all the lizards, potentially.
Slowly, you make the poked lizard grow, but, at first, doesn't do anything aside from the fact it was causing the girls to walk backward, only so they could poke it from a safe distance. It's only when the lizard had grown to the size of a dog that you start to notice that things were changing. The girls drop their sticks and starts to rub the lizard, who went from anger to a seeming pleasure as it closes its eyes, letting even a hearable happy murring. Continuing to grow it, the girls would also ride it when it was the size of a horse, all that while giggling.

As it goes further on, you notice that, while there is less and less people traveling by, some cracks and holes that looked like the lizard's feet appeared around. A loud growl could even be heard, given that, as its size went up, so did its hunger. Thankfully, under the innocent watch of the girls, you were in no danger whatsoever. And yet.. You had no idea of what would occur at you grow the scaled beast further on.

As the lizard's length reaches 150ft, it's like it had disappeared with the girls, before you are forced to close your eyes as the light suddenly went harsh, or so you think. When you could see again, you are greeted by the girls, while looking strangely different..

Camellia, the 16-years girl, has become a 150 ft green anthropomorphic lizard. Wearing a white t-shit on which is written 'Motherly dragon ahead~', as well as an awfully short skirt, given it would hardly conceal her pink panties, she stands onto a digitigrade stance, barefooted, thanks to her new body. Alice, 14-years old, is her little sister. Being a human-lizard hybrid standing at 130 ft tall, she only wears a teal bikini. And while most of her skin is human, some patch of scales could be found here and here on her body, as well as a scaled white underbelly.
Much like her big sister, her hands and toes bolsters small claws, while onto their backside stands long tails, both dragging onto the ground. You also notice that they have an equally sharp dentition as they gently smiles toward you.

Then, the previously grown lizard had shrunk down to its normal size and climbs your body so it would actually be able to lay onto your head, causing you to have a flashback. You and the girls were younger, about 10 years younger, you think back then. Loud whimpering could be heard, so, out of curiosity, you follow the sound trail. Turns out it were coming from the girls, as their lizard beings, if you exclude the fact that they were only 30ft and 26 ft tall. Both girls were sitting onto the grass, while Camellia tried to soothe her sobering sister. You inquire, 'Are you alright, girls?'. In answer, Alice yells, 'We're not size freaks..!'.

You walked around them, noticing that Camellia, trying to look tough, was crying too. As such, you placed yourself between the girls and said, 'Dry your tears, girls. Big Brother's here!'. It had an impact given the girls' cries had weakened up. 'Y-you won't make fun of us..?'. You grinned, 'Why i'd make cute girls like you crying? Besides.. I'll protect you!'. Both girls giggles, then Camellia said, jokingly, 'What a cute little doll!'. You blush at the comment, before a lizard climbs on your head, making you grumble. More giggles could be heard from the girls, as Alice added, 'Sunny on lil'bro!'. You sighed, then grinned again. Little you knew, back then, but you had unofficially had became their brother, with your new pet lizard, 'Sunny'. Since then, your family and the sisters' had acknowledge each others, entertaining friendly relationships.

As the flashback end, knowing that 'Sunny' stands onto your head, the girls says, 'You're coming, little brother?'. 'Yeah, pick me up, okay?'.
From there, you ponder what you could do. You could just tag along, eventually inviting some of your brothers and sisters, eventually messing their size and Sunny's up. Or you could shrink them. Although, you had the feeling that if you tried to shrink them directly, it would undo their transformation.

the girl agreed if they promised not to bully anyone again.

135.title: The Mall

1351.content:
You walked into the mueseum, it was free between 12 and 1, which it luckily was.

It was pretty crowded, but also boring, nothing but huge models held together with metals and string.

What could you learn from a still, un-moving, DEAD model?

Perhaps change was in order...

There was a huge T-Rex in front of you, bringing something to life shouldn't change time, only size could do that, so you concentrated and in seconds, it lived! Breaking free of its restraints it charged into the crowd and at you!

That was definitely a mistake, you quickly shrank it to nothing but a toy.

Next...
1351.title: Museum

13511.content:
Shrinking that dinosaur must have changed a lot in the past, everything changed.

Suddenly you were 4800ft. tall outside the mall and for some reason your skating shoes had turned into a pair of flip-flops.

Around you there were a few other giants and out in the distance you saw what must've been a town for giants, but to you it wasn't very big, luckily though, whatever changed in the past must've also made a few giant plants and animals.

So, what do you do now?
13511.title: Up

135111.content:
You decided to explore the tiny city and near-by towns, you first headed for the city, the skyscrapers just barely at your knees, but your feet didn't fit between them, nor your toes for that matter.

Eventually you found that if you put one foot on a street and the other on another, you could fit through the city, but only using the wider roads.

At the end of the city you tripped and fell, and had some weird weight on your back? You turned to find a pack-pack scaled to your size. With this discovery you left the city and examined what was inside:

1. Black ankle socks
2. Skating Shoes
3. Sandals
4. Note-pad
5. Weird, un-indentifiable junk
6. A "Rules" sheet

The "rules" sheet was interesting, apparently giants had somewhat gotten along with the tinys, you quickly read it, skipping a few rules:

1. Only wear sandals/flip-flops or be barefoot around tinys
2. Be careful when around tinys
5. Do not fight in confined areas
8. Do not steal

It listed others, but you didn't particularly care about rules.

While you sat there it started to heat up, with you sweating what to the tinys was 10ft. blobs, while you sat there you saw a cute girl on the beach, but she was a tiny so you couldn't see much, so you grew her.

Next...

1351111.content:
Apparently, growing her was a mistake, there were now 3 sizes of ppl. she was a giant, and you had shrunken to 1/32nd of an inch to a tiny!

That was a mistake, do you get a chance to change that...

1351112.title: up...

135112.content:
You decided to explore the giants' half of this place, walking from the tinys' town over to a dirt path lined with houses.

As you crossed over you tripped and found a weight on your back, you quickly turned and found a backpack, inside were:

1. Black Ankle-Socks
2. Skating shoes
3. Sandals
4. "Rules" sheet
5. Note-pad
6. A ton of weird stuff you couldn't identify

The "rules" sheet was of little interest to you, although these ppl. had gotten along with the tinys, you probably would not.

Before you stood up you put your flip-flops in the back-pack and walked to what appeared to be your house, with Tom outfront, he....
135112.title: Explore Giant Land

1351122.content:
That confused you, at this size what could anyone possibly explore?

Do you go along with it or just head inside...

13511221.content:

You followed Tom into the house and to his room where he kicked off his flip-flops, you did like-wise and followed him to a strange pad against the wall.

"Whos the T this time" Tom asked, now you had no clue what this is, but not wanting to be a full you answer...
13511221.title: Go with it

choices: Tom takes you to Tinys' city
135112211.content:
For some reason, you said yes instead of you or me, but Tom didn't care,

"Alright, so your the T this time" he said, standing next to a control panel in the wall, presumably, you were to stand on the pad and you did so.

Tom activated the pad and this weird arm-band popped out of the pad on a robotic arm and slapped itself around your ankle, and the next thing you know, your a tiny!

Technology was definitely different in this place...

"Alright you've got about 30min." Tom said now a walking tower.

Next....

You tell him "not now" and head inside, you could find out later.

The house still had 2 floors, but everything else was different, almost everything was hard-wood, the layout had changed, everything!

You walked around the house, found your room and all then and were bored, what do you do now?
13511222.title: Nah, into your house

135112222.content: There was still more to do....
135112222.title: Others

1351122222.content:
The tinys were too big, you wanted them smaller still!

You walked out of your house and down the path to the tinys' city and concentrated on all the tinys, forcing them to shrink, and soon the tallest structures of the city barely made it 1/4 the way up your toes, and quite finely, your "rules" were all but non-existent.

Bending down and looking through a powerfull magnifying glass you saw the tinys were
1/800th of an inch tall, and you'd be 283,200ft. tall to them even little Tom would be 206,400ft. tall to them. An inch to you was 3933 feet to them.

You were done here for now and returned home, and...
1351122222.title: A tinier tiny

13511222222.content:
You walked in the door to find that there were Tinys everywhere to be seen!

They covered the stairs, the railing, everything!

Walking up to your room you sat on your bed to find millions of them on your little-toe alone, they were specs!

Nxt...
13511222222.title: Tinys everywhere...

135112222221.content:
You decided to get outside again, apparently you had grown a dislike of the tinies for some reason or another.

When you got back Tom grabbed you and said "c'mon, time for the switch"

This confused you, but you went with it, though you dug through your back-pack for something of aid, and indeed found it, a rules sheet had been in there, reading:

1. Do with a tiny as you wish
2. We are friends with tinys however
3. Tinys may go where they wish
4. There is to be a....

"Ok, put these on" he said, handing you a different looking set of clothes, very quickly you changed in your bathroom and came back. The dress looked like something from the days before technology, a peasant's outfit really, big clothe cloak, shirt and shorts of some sort. As you headed to your little brother, you dumped your stuff on the floor, returning to your reading of the list.

For a second you were aware of stepping on something, "ouch!" Tom said, jumping up and down holding his one foot. "You stepped on my foot!"

"How am I supposed to know, ye' got such little feet!" you reply, once more trying to read the list.

You didn't get a chance to read the rest as Tom pushed you onto a weird metal pad, and suddenly he started growing! Inch by inch he got bigger than you, then inches turned to ft. as he started looming over-head, and minutes later he was monstrous and you were a tiny!

As you stood on the pad you quickly read the 4th rule:

4. There is to be a weekly "exchange", 1 of us per house shall trade places with a tiny for 48hrs.

Before you could make a movement, some weird hovering thing drug you off and across to see another pad with a tiny on it, and then you watched as he grew and soon dwarfed even Tom!

Nxt....
135112222221.title: getting along

1351122222211.content:
The hover pad, or whatever it was, zoomed over miles of metal to a tiny city. Meanwhile though, you turned to see a titan standing where you had a second ago, he looked like a walking country! Only the speedy ascent of the hover-thing had kept you from being caught on the dirty mass of sweat that made up the creature's foot. Still over it, you looked up along his whole body to see him looking all around the room.

"So, where is my counter-part?" the giant asked Tom, and then, realizing it was your room he occupied changed the subject, "never mind, up for wrestle buddy?"

That wasn't good, you were still an eternity from safety, the formerly nano-scopic feet still blocked your path, in the past twenty minutes, you'd made it across the left foot and now occupied the miles between the feet. Luckily for you, the giant twitched his foot just a bit, it created a wind so strong it would have made hurricanes look like average winds. The result hurtled you across the cap, nearly hitting the enormous right, big toe.

Much lower now, you looked up at the enormous grooves filling the skin, the things that made finger and foot prints. They were HUGE! Easily deep enough to hold a sky-scraper that was one thing for sure. Slowly you cranned your neck up at the sheer height of the five mountains called toes, trying to imagine yourself from this view. Within minutes, the craft was upward and over the first gap between the mountains, below you saw a boulder that had to be at least a mile tall, mud, dirt and yuck. Briefly, you bent over and found your feet to be in a similar status anyway.
1351122222211.title: Giant "tiny" enemy

13511222222111.content:
."Why not?" Tom said, though he was clearly out-matched. Minutes ago of course he would simply have wiggled his toes and that would have been the end of the match, but the adversary was as big as you had been. "Outside?"

"Sure" the giant said, stepping up and capturing you for just a second. You were on the huge foot and then went flying as the step went forward. For a few seconds you flew over you clothes, big enough that your socks would easily cover all of New York city and likely crush it. After that, your path continued on.

Tom's "little" feet were right in your path. They were long enough to crush a city with ease at nearly 6 miles where before they had barely been close to 7 inches. On your approach you could see the spot of dirt left from stepping on them. To him though, your feet were truly microscopic, at 1/5600th of an inch long. If he did to you what you'd done to him, you'd be a bloody stain on his foot and maybe the bottom of a half-mile deep crater.

Quickly, you pulled out the rules list again, wondering if you'd misread anything in your hast:

"Tiny creatures are everywhere. As we cannot avoid killing them, it is not a crime to do so, even to a shrunken one of our own."

As you looked up, you caught sight of your new home for a while. The hovering machine slammed into the rock-hard side of the titan Tom's toes. It was somewhere on the inside part of the little toe, at least you hoped it was. Either way, the hovering machine was a wreak and now you were the shortest in the family, even to the former shortest thing in the house. From a section of toe-print you sat down, held on by gravity as the titan ran outside, it was a world to put any forest to shame.
13511222222111.title: The game

135112222221111.content:
Tom took only a few steps out into the yard, the giant passed him and was at the middle. At the moment, escape appeared to be a total impossiblility. From your perch, you examined the area, grass stalks miles tall that you had crushed beneath your feet not all that long ago, mud that was now miles deep, bugs bigger than cities. Oddly, there even were cities, the tinies lived even in the yard, despite the odds of being trampled there, they were far, far below you though and far spread, though you could imagine all the destruction.

Looking at the mud, trees and the titan enemy, if you didn't get thrown off or escape, the dirt would surely bury you. First you'd get flung towards the enemy who might as well be an iron mountain. After that, the enormous foot would come crashing through the forest of grass and smash down, sinking into the mud, taking plants around with it. Following that, either a repitition of the first thing or getting trampled by the enemy giant as he attacked. Enormous stuff would be shot into the air to impact on both fighters not to mention the flexibility of human skin, making you practically totally exposed, to top things off Tom preferred to attack with his feet.

Luckily, just as the game was about to begin, another titan approached, dressed like you were except for a bracelet around his ankle. He ran at Tom and with the force of colliding planets, he slammed into him. He went down and both were on the ground, you were nearly crushed by the attacker's feet as they slammed into Tom's. You wondered how many tiny bloodstains were on your own feet, it would probably be impossible to find out though, nothing was small enough.

As you stand up, you hear the giants talking overhead, "Pad in your bro's room? Thanks." Its not Tom, so its the new arrival. "Your a life-saver, without that pad, we wouldn't do the switch this week, I'd have to be a tiny for weeks."
135112222221111.title: Playing

1351122222211111.content:
Step after step, the house got closer and closer, but the sound of Tom's taunts disappeared bit by bit to the distance, you were on that new-comer and he was going to shrink. It would end up with you being tiny, to a tiny! A minute ago you'd said nothing was small enough to see the blood that'd be on a shrunken giant's foot, but now their would be.

Walls shot by and soon you saw your room. First you bed was plainly in view, then a second later, your clothes putting tons of force on the floor and making miles of mountain range. The titan paused at the pile, for a second it seemed you may be able to escape into your own shoes, but the opportunity goes as fast as it came. At last, you see the cold metal assembly that was the shrinking device. You were about to become the shortest in your family and on the planet, forever.
1351122222211111.title: With the swapper

13511222222111112.content:
The giant activates the shrinking platform, nothing happens except for a glow and loud hum. Apparently the platform had to charge up, last time Tom must have gotten to it first to save time. Earlier you had taken your time too, so maybe this would be a while.

Your legs dangled over the ledge of the skin-shelf you sat on, waiting for something to happen. For a second you saw a pebble that had been caught in your toes fall loose and miles to the ground. This was boring, this technology needed a serious update. At least you thought that until there was a sudden flash.

Like last time, the world grew at an exponential rate, except this time your immediate surroundings did not. Within seconds, the normal guy was a tiny and you were a tiny to him and all the others. By your math-based guessing, Tom's inch was 5,120,000ft to you, his toes alone would be around 1000 miles tall and his whole foot would dwarf the Earth on your scale. At least now you could say your sneakers were once bigger than the Earth, to scale anyway. For that matter, your shirt would have been able to hold the whole thing inside with room for more.

An instant later, your shaken back to reality as your small stature re-asserts itself. The titan, whoever he is has reached the city, an official is there to greet him. "Your not Billy!" he says right away, so at least they knew something was wrong.

"Tom said he should've been here by now. I'm Mat, the platform in my house is currently out, me and Jack had to do our switch here." he explains, "its rather dark out, could I stay here for the night?"

"We've got a treat for you then" the official said, "we had to cancel Billy's trip to the outter edges, he was gonna be in the lap of luxury tonight."

[That night]

Mat was indeed surrounded by luxury. He had been dressed to go to the outter regions like you were, but now he'd totally changed and was in modern clothes. Places near the humans were more advanced, but those out in the yard or farther off were far less developed
13511222222111112.title: Smallest on Earth

135112222221111122.content:
The evening had come on quickly, all up to it had been spent by your titan friend just lounging around and taking in the view of the city and your room. This wasn't exactly your choice of how to do things, but at least it was safe for you. If the giant were to actually do anything, there would be the chance of getting hurled out of the city and into giant's territory not to mention the odds of becoming a blood-stain no one would ever be able to see.

In the same enormous groove as earlier, you were sitting down and still planning just how to escape. Your view was of the sky as the giant laid on his bed with his back on a mountain of pillows. At least it was until he decided that he needed to be more active and that lounging was for later.

Miles were covered in seconds as the titan toes were shoved forward and off the bed, from here you got a view of all the low stuff in the lowest city to ever exist. Under the bed, you saw a pair of skating shoes, socks, sweats and a shirt that somehow you knew were yours from other stays. This room was yours for life so long as you didn't destroy it, it was the tiny's peace offering so that in normal form you let their city be. It was a small part high up in the buiding that was given as no giant expected to live in a room smaller than a thread of their socks and have to pay for it. The enormous clothes weren't the tiny's though, they were shrunk with you in a prior trip so there'd be something to where and then you left them here for safe keeping and to be sure there'd always be something to wear here.

Mat would be going back to his house the next day, millions of miles away to you right now, so it was far better to stay here in this room than go with him. When he came by the shoes again, you saw the bright white lace of one of your shoes sticking out. At this size, gravity would have almost no pull on you, so with quite a deal of fear and no thought, you jumped over the edge.

Enormous distances shot by, you were lighter, but smaller so it was to scale just as fast as if you'd fallen at normal size down the same distance. That string down below was gonna be like concrete, despite the numerous times it had been soft as clothe sitting in your shoe.
135112222221111122.title: Making an escape

choices: Back to being a normal tiny
1351122222211111221.content:
Enough of being a speck! Your skater shoes sitting by the clothes over there a million miles beyond the city and next to the bed were bigger than a planet and one of your little brother's feet was that big, he could crush a planet between them if he wanted. He was supposed to be smaller than you, not a beast that walked across the solar system.

You concentrated on the size of everything changing to fit your will and then would make yourself bigger to fit in. However, your thoughts are disrupted as a titanium wall slams into you, the giant's foot twitched. It could have effected the thoughts any one of a million ways...
1351122222211111221.title: Use Powers

13511222222111112211.content:
You were hit a lot harder than you thought, Mat's foot shot you out of the room and across millions of miles, all the while your powers were still acting on the universe, but uncontrolled as your mind lost focus. Your last thoughts were controlling the change, it could be extreme or maybe it was just minor. Before getting hit you were thinking about how small the tiny's were and about when you'd made them smaller, thinking about making them bigger or perhaps making yourself normal and that enemy your size.

Eventually, you landed on your shoes, the planet-sized ones. At the toe, the leather is enormous, little bits that have been torn at by microscopic forces stretch forever into the sky. You look along in search of what changed when overhead you see....
13511222222111112211.title: Mega-micro Tiny civilizations

choices: "You" return and head to friends house
135112222221111122111.content:
Its an enormous you! He's many, many times the size of the Earth and dressed normally but is otherwise an exact copy of you! Addmitedly, everyone probably wonders what it'd be like to see themselves from the outside, but you never wanted to look at yourself from that outside when the other 'you' had toes bigger than Texas. It was just dangerous and would probably leave you, dead.

The giant disappeared from sight and you went back to looking around. Built into a piece of leather, you find a computer terminal, of all things. In search of answers, you immediately start poking at the touch screen interface and eventually come upon a history by the tiny's. Apparently, every giant born has a tiny twin and several tiny siblings, but being as big as they are, have yet to discover the microscopic creatures. As far as advancement, the Tiny's are quite advanced around the giants and build their structures into every day things and sometimes on the people themselves.

It can be dangerous, but there are about 500 tiny's for every giant and even a baby is bigger than a planet. That's a lot of ground, and on them, because of that size there are very few laws of physics to look out for. A wall generates enough gravity to hold people and some structures to it, as does the roof and almost everything. The biggest fears are being crushed, drown or eaten.

A tiny could be crushed easily, often the imperfections in everything help survive, but not nearly half the time. Around the giants, there's a million liquids to drown in; sweat, water, cereal, chemicals, spit and more. As for being eaten, bits of food must be stolen, to do that one must be near the food and its very easy to get caught and eaten. They were everywhere and the giants never knew it...
135112222221111122111.title: 2 of You, 2 of Me

13511222222111112212.content:
Having your concentration shaken like that wasn't a very good thing. Luckily, the results weren't too far off what you wanted. Ideally, you'd be human sized and you weren't. However, you were a tiny, which is significantly larger than being a tiny, compared to another tiny. The difference was quite major, for one, you brother wasn't bigger than the Earth, for another, the tiniest population on Earth was your size and not giants, a tiny kindergartner was not bigger than you, and so on.

Standing there, memories came to of what had changed. The shrinking pad in your house was down, so you had to use Mat's, it had been almost immediately after his shrinking. An idea came to mind and quickly you sat down, then began to look at your foot through a magnifying glass. Around you middle toe and the next smallest, you found a wrecked hover-platform, being far larger than a person it was the easiest thing to see, though was also a speck. A much more powerful magnifying glass would be needed to see Mat.

Looking out your window, you see that you are in your room and its night time, all the lights in the house are out and the only thing for you to see by is the moonlight. On further examination, you also find that your in a very nice set of PJ pants and a simple white T-shirt. Yawning, you decide that you'll either help or ignore the trapped mega-tiny tomorrow.

Joshua, the younger middle brother, was a very feminine-looking guy. Shoulder-length hair, slender frame, androgynous face. If it weren't for him being your brother, you simply wouldn't be able to tell what gender he was. Even his voice, still untouched by puberty, was perfectly androgynous.

Josh popped off your house's roof like a tupperware lid and placed a hand in the center of your room. "Hop on", he said excitedly, "Our show's almost on!"

You look at his hand with mistrust. Josh was the nicest of your brothers and the two of you got along just fine, but his sheer size compared to you was a little offputting. Still, you calmly step onto it and sit down in the middle of his palm.

As soon as you sit down, fingers the size of tree trunks curl around your legs, holding you firmly in place as you're lifted high into the air. Though he's clearly excited, Josh makes an effort to walk slowly for your sake.

From your vantage point in Josh's hand you get a pretty good look of his room, and it looks very different from the version you're used to. Looks like your parents used all the money they saved from you being so small to pamper themselves and their children a bit. In Joshua's case, this meant a giant TV ganging on the wall, a huge beanbag chair and a bunch of anime figures. Apparently, somewhere along the way this version of Josh had turned into a massive otaku.

Josh lowered himself onto the bean bag and reached for the TV remote, then plopped you down on his belly. The show Josh was talking about was apparently some sort of magical girl anime. You have no idea what's going on in it, but it looks interesting enough so you sit and watch it. During commercials, one of Josh's hands pulls up behind you and strokes your back with one fingertip. This gives you a very pleasant feeling and every time the show came back on you found yourself hoping for the next commercial break to come quickly.

From here, it would be best to try and leave his shirt through the neck hole. As you fly out of the shirt alongside his gigantic neck, you feel intimidated by his astronomical size.

Sticking close to Tom, you manage to follow him around the field as he plays. Whizzing around near his mid-section, you end up tailing behind his gigantic rear. At one point you had almost flown straight into his bottom as he halted suddenly. Another close call came when a swift change in his direction caused you to almost zoom into his chest. Thankfully you avoided the collision by flying up to his face, where he almost sucked you into his mouth a few times. Following him was exhausting.

Flying your plane in the vicinity of Tom's face was the safest way to keep up with him, but even that had it's dangers. Deciding it was too dangerous to be around him right now, you sheltered in his left ear. Now you were flying through his ear canal, looking for shelter and a much needed chat with Tom.

You eventually reach his eardrum and use the intercom on your plane to get his attention. "Tom! It's your brother! I'm like germ-sized now and I'm in a tiny plane inside your ear!"

Does he hear you?
1422221222121122.title: Around Tom in 80 Days

14222212221211221.content:
"Wow bro, you're in my head?"

You heard his response and breathed a sigh of relief. Him knowing about you would certainly make things less dangerous and chaotic.

"Yes! Tom, I'm in here!"

"Awesome! You can come out now, I'm alone in my room. I wanna see you for myself!" he said, his voice echoing through the caverns in his ears.

"Alright, but you'll have to be really careful. My plane is almost germ-sized after all. Hold on, I'm going to leave the communicator here in your eardrum so I can talk to you without having to be in your ear."

Setting the plane down, you climb out into the surreal world of Tom's inner ear and begin to set up the communications unit against his eardrum. Once this was done, you clambered back into your plane and prepared to leave Tom's head. Then you had a really cool idea.

"Hey Tom, when I give the signal, I want you to open your mouth." you didn't wait for a response from Planet Tom and flew past his eardrum and down a different tunnel. You arrived at the back of his throat as planned and flew your microscopic plane through the dark interior of his mouth. You dodged around his uvula and landed on his massive tongue. "Okay Tom, I'm in your mouth right now. Whatever you do, don't swallow. Yet."

You exited the plane once again, climbing out onto the alien landscape of Tom's tongue. Being microscopic made it seem like you were exploring some vast unknown place. The soft flesh beneath your shoes, the moist, warm atmosphere... it was unlike anything you'd ever experienced. Having spent a moment in the strange land, you decided it was time to hop back in the plane and leave. "Okay Tom, open up."

You flew right out of his mouth to the world outside."That was awesome!"

"Are you out? Can I swallow now?"

"Yeah, I'm out."

Tom swallowed loudly.

"Oh no, I was only kidding! You just swallowed me!"

"Oh no! I'm sorry, you said you were out!"

"Oh god, I'm in your stomach! It's gross down here!" you teased, actually flying a good distance from him to try and gauge his reaction to your fake story. It was working. You watched the boy lift his shirt to expose his belly, worriedly talking to you as if you were inside.

"What should I do?"

"I don't know, looks like I'm stuck in here. Until you poop me out tomorrow."

"Oh no, I'm sorry bro..." he said, patting his stomach. "I didn't mean it..."

You felt a little guilty for tricking him like this, so decided to give up the ruse. "Tom... I'm not really in your stomach. You didn't swallow me, I got out of your mouth. I was just seeing what you'd do..." you confess, flying close to his eyes. "Sorry..."

You got the impression he had seen you, his moon-sized eye casting it's gaze on you. "Bro? Is that you?"

"Yeah, see I got out."

"Wow... you really are small! I'm gonna have to be real careful around you." he said. "We could play some fun games. Where do you want to explore?"

Tom decided to lay on his bed, his shirt lifted half way up his mountainous belly. More than ever, he was a living landscape. "You can explore my body now."

You whizzed down over his face, making your way down to his belly. Landing by his navel, you climbed out of the plane and stood on the soft, fleshy plain. The ground rose and fell beneath you, with every massive breath Tom took. You could faintly hear and feel the subterranean activity deep down inside his gut, his belly rumbling occasionally. You stared out into the massive chasm of his belly button, which resembled something akin to the Grand Canyon at this size. Having seen enough, you got back into your plane and took off once again.

Flying low over his belly, you zoomed across his expansive torso and toward his face. Tom craned his neck down at the last minute as if to check on you and you flew straight into his mouth, this time inadvertently careening down his throat. "Woah! Tom! I'm going down your throat, for real this time!" you called out as you descended through his dark interior.

"Yum! You were delicious bro!" His voice echoed around you now.

You went all the way down his esophagus and arrived in his stomach. It was a massive living cavern of unimaginable size, wrinkly walls of flesh stretching for miles around the endless ocean of bubbling stomach acid below. Foul gases steamed off the surface, creating an overbearing warm atmosphere. "Oh my god... this is your stomach... I'm in your stomach!"

"That's so cool, what's it like?"

"It's gross... but kinda cool. I wonder how I'm gonna get out of here though..." you trail off, flying low over the gross sea of gastric nastiness.

"Umm... I think I know." Tom said, squeezing out a small fart. "That way probably."

"Oh gross! I guess this is karma for my little prank earlier, huh?" you say, dodging past a gas bubble.

"Well that's the way out, like it or not. You can try to fly out of there now, or you can take the chance to explore inside my tummy. While you're in my belly, how about we have some more fun?"

"What are you thinking?"

"A game. You have to dodge the food I eat! Or I can just lay here and wait for you to make your way out of my butt. Well, what do you wanna do?"

You take a moment to weigh your options. On the one hand, you could leave Tom's body as soon as possible. You weren't crazy about the exit strategy but you'd be out of his body. On the other hand, you could live a little and play a fairly dangerous game in Tom's stomach, prolonging your stay in his belly. You eventually come to a decision.
