14222221.title: Climb

142222212.content:
You decide to take the trek up your brother's body. You slowly make your way up to his toes, completely in awe at how easily they tower over you. The toe closest to you, Tom's big toe, it over 100 feet tall at your scale.

You soon reach Tom's toenail, which is as thick as you are tall. You vault over it and find yourself in the little crevice between Tom's toe and his nail.

The wall of Tom's toe goes almost straight up in front of you. Thankfully, at your size you could climb the folds of Tom's toeprint like a ladder. You reach up, grab a hold of some skin, and start climbing.

About halfway up, Tom wiggles his toes and the slight movement thrashes you around like an earthquake. You hold on tightly, pressing yourself up against his skin, until the movement stops. Thankfully, this part of Tom's toe was actually pretty clean, or else there would have been an avalanche of dirt boulders raining down on you.

You stay here pressed against Tom for a moment. Tom's skin is pleasantly warm. So pleasant, in fact, that you kinda just want to stay here for a few hours, just relaxing and basking in your brother's toe's body heat.
142222212.title: Climbing Mount Toe

1422222122.content:
As comfortable as you were down there, you really should move on now.

As you reached the top of Tom's toe, you looked out on the immense landscape of his body. The titanic boy is busy poking around on his smartphone screen, too busy to notice his little speck of a brother down on his foot. Hopefully that should keep him busy long enough for you to make the trek all the way up his body before he gets up.

You make your way to the other end of the toe and find a fifty foot drop from Tom's toe down to his foot. You sigh at the prospect of having to painstakingly climb down the toe, but then it occurs to you that at your size you could probably survive the fall. After all, if a mouse can survive a three foot drop from a table, surely you could survive a half-inch drop to your brother's foot. Of course, if you're wrong it would be... very painful. Do you jump?
1422222122.title: On Top of Tom's Toe

14222221222.content:
You decide to take the safe choice and climb down your brother's toe. You get down on all fours and begin making your way down the flesh mountain.

Only partway down, Tom wiggles his toes again, this time catching you off guard and throwing you down into the valley between his first and second digits. Firmly wedged between two walls of flesh, you squirm and struggle to push yourself out, only to find yourself pressed even more firmly as Tom keeps moving his toes. Your tiny body is toyed with as Tom wiggles his toes back and forth, rolling you around as if you were no more than a pebble.

Finally the toes stop moving, leaving you trapped right between them with just your head poking out above the sole, but before you can even try to get out, Tom's foot begins moving again. The foot turns around, hits the floor, then turns and goes back up, all of this happening at incredible speeds. You look up to figure out what's going on, only to find your brother's godly face looking down on you.

Hey bro," Tom said with a voice louder than any thunderclap you've ever heard. "I figured it was you down there. You sure do love playing on my toes, huh?" Tom laughed and wiggled his toes teasingly. "If you wanted to be close to my feet you should have told me so I could give you what you want. In fact, why don't I do that right now? C'mon, I'll let you..."
14222221222.title: Climb down

choices: You worked very hard. You'll get a reward for your efforts.
142222212221.content:
Tom placed his foot with both heels on the ground and the toes pointing up, then unclenched his toes and let you fall to the floor. Dazed but otherwise unharmed, you got up on your feet, only to hear a loud clanging noise behind you.

You turn to find a giant penny wobbling around on the floor some 6 normal-sized inches away from you. "Alright bro", Tom's voice boomed down at you like the voice of god. "If you can make it to the coin in less than ten minutes, you win the game. I'll try to stop you with my feet, ok? Oh, and if you make it there in less than five minutes, I'll even give you a special reward. Ready, set, go!"

Of course, this isn't really a game, it's more like Tom toying with you. At your size, Tom could easily stop you from reaching the coin by just pinning you under just one of his toes. But you've got nothing better to do so you figure you might as well play along. Who knows, maybe you really do like spending time with Tom's feet.

You start jogging just to see what Tom does to stop you. Almost immediately, you're knocked off your feet by the impact of Tom slapping his feet against the ground around you. Far above you, you hear Tom giggling at you. "You're so weak, bro! I didn't even touch you and you fell down!"

You get back up again, expecting your brother to pull the same trick again. Instead, he lifts his feet high above you and begins rubbing the soles together. All of a sudden, grains of sand the size of your fist that had been stuck to your brother's feet begin raining down on you. A few of then hit your body, and one of them almost makes you trip, but other than that you make it though the storm just fine.

Once you're about a quarter of the way there, Tom stops rubbing his feet together and places one of them back down on the floor, its massive sole hanging over your head. His titanic toes wiggle overhead as Tom slowly lowers his foot down. You start running faster, trying to get somewhere safe, just barely making it under the curve of Tom's toes as his sole comes crashing down behind you.

You make your way out from under Tom's foot, crawling out though the gap between his second and third toes. "So you made it though ok, huh?" You hear Tom say behind you. "Okay bro, just one more obstacle to get though." Tom's foot lifts up behind you and comes down between you and the coin, heel to the left and toes to the right. "You have to crawl under it."

You hesitate and turn around to look at your brother. "Go on. I promise you'll be safe down there," Tom said, gently smiling down at you. Feeling more confident, you approach his foot with a light jog. Your brother might like to tease you, he would never do anything to hurt you.

At the foot, you continue jogging under the inner arch. Tom's sole is still comfortably high above you, letting you walk upright without any issue. As you progress, tough, his sole comes down closer and closer untin you have to get down and crawl under it. Eventually, you get to the place where Tom's foot meets the ground, and you're left with no choice but to flatten yourself on the ground and try to crawl though to the other side.

You get down on your back, using your hands to grab ahold of Tom's skin to pull yourself forward. You do this many times until, finally, you make it out of though to the other side. Exhausted, you lay down on the ground, breathing heavily, as Tom lifts his foot up to get a look at you. Good job bro! I knew you could do it! Just a little bit more to go, don't give up now! In fact, let me help you out a bit."

Tom placed his foot over you again and brought it down until the big toe was resting on the penny. He slides the coin towards you. The coin is so close now, you manage to touch it just by reaching out. "Congrats, bro! You made it though in just eight minutes!"
142222212221.title: Race against Tom's feet

Back outside, there was a way up onto the couch as well, your brother's now enormous foot was dangled over the side and lazily sitting on the wooden floors. A huge hike and climb was ahead, but would get you to your destination. Once you got to the titan toes, it would be at least a 203ft. climb just to get on them and then miles to the giant's head, assuming your math was right. You never had gone mountain climbing.

Its here that things got tricky, the heel is all that touched the ground, the black bottom coated in dirt was high in the sky.

There seemed no way up from here. Aside from sweat and skin, there was nothing there, it was like a rock-cliff, you weren't gonna waltz right up. At least on the toes, there were grooves in the skin that made prints on objects. That is how you had planed to go up. Of course, this dirt could be sticky enough to get there....

143111111.content:
You look around the room, trying to think of a new game you could play if you changed something. There wasn't anything you could really think of in particular, but you know it would be really cool if both Tommy and you could enjoy the bigness of the room. You want to keep the same size ratio between you two, but have the room seem enormous to both of you. So, the only thing you can think of is to grow the size of the room, while focusing on keeping everyone in your family the same size. It was going to be a strain, but it is going to be worth it. You begin to concentrate on what you need to do. You know you must keep your eyes open, for fear you may overdo it, or even do too little. You watch, from Tommy's giant chest, the room rising high above both of you. The bed expands as the seconds go by.

Eventually, your head begins to hurt, but you endure for a bit. You wait until Tommy would be about a foot tall in this room, so everything is four times as large to both of you. After you stop, it feels like you have a headache, but it quickly leaves you. You turn to Tommy, and ask him why the room is so big.

He responds, "Huh, why are you asking?" You realize the idiocy of your question, considering what these powers do, but you yourself don't know.

"I just like being reminded. It still blows my mind." You think maybe that will get an answer from him.

"Yeah... Mom and Dad expected me to be much bigger than I actually am when they requested it to be built. Normally, it would have cost them a fortune to build something this large, considering it is so large, but they were able to get the money through funds from some labs interested in my growth." He stared off into the room, somewhat pensive. "Though, I love that it is so big. It is the only place in the house where I feel small." He smiled at you.

Wanting to get back to your game, you look around the room again to see what you can do. You see that most of the wooden furniture inside the room now have etchings in the m that look like you would be able to climb them. Plus, given Tommy's size, he could probably climb to where he wants without the etchings.

You think that hide and seek could be much more fun in this room, but there is also tag, which may be hard, considering the size difference, but it could be fun, considering the size of the actual playing field. You suggest...

1431112111.content:
You think to yourself, and finally suggest "Let's go to the skate park!" As soon as the words escape your mouth, tom grows a sad smile on his face. A memory slaps you full force. In it, Tom and you were skating when a group of drunken teenagers begin to harass you. Despite your height, they all outweigh you. Tom to the rescue! however, the owner of the park sees the action and assumed Tom was the one who started the fight when in reality, he was the one protecting you from angry drunks. All of you were banned from the park for a full year. your vision clears as you see Tom starring down at his large skate board. you reach up to pat his knee.

"It's alright. I shouldn't have brought it up. I'm sorry," you say in your most comforting voice. Tom's hand moves until it completely envelops your own, pinning you in place. He looks down at you meeting you gaze. A small smile spreads across his face.

"As long as your okay, i'm fine." He continues to smile at you. you smile back. You vaguely remember all the times that the two of you have been there for each other. All the times you included Tom in the fun you two had at recess when all the other kids were afraid of him. All the times he protected you from the bullies when they would make fun of him for being the shortest in elementary (a phase which didn't last long as his growth spurt was a good foot in one year). You two always had each other's backs, and you would stick together through thick and thin.

tom finally lifts his hand off of yours while he continued to smile at you. Laughing a bit, you climb onto the couch, which feels almost second nature to you now. He looks down at you, a tower of comfort. Leaning against his arm (which you notice isn't as muscled as your own, despite the size difference) you think about what else the two of you could do. An idea strikes your mind.

"Hey! How about we go the beach! We can still go there and if you skate, we'll get there even faster!" Tom's eyes light up. He picks you up in his hand , which frightens you a bit, and hugs you to his chest. When he pulls you away, you see the biggest smile on his face.

"Yeah! That sounds great! Let's go get our stuff, and we can go!" He quickly, yet gently, places you on the floor and he scampers to get his things together. You smile to yourself. Despite making him as old as you, he's still very childish. A thought crosses your mind. Tom was apparently always being picked on for his loft stature, and you always want to be there for him to comfort him. why not grow yourself a bit taller, enough for people to give you looks as well, but not so much where you as tall as Tom. You like knowing that you can depend on each other for different things, and if you were exactly alike you wouldn't have that. concentrating, you slowly increase your height. You both get bullied at times, but you still have the same friends. More people are wary of you personally now and you're still banned from the skate park for the same reasons, but that doesn't matter to you. He's wearing his trunks and looks down at you with an excited face. You notice that you come up just over his mid-thigh. you look down and notice that you were wearing your trunks as well. 'Was I always wearing these/' you thought to yourself. Shrugging, you look back up into the face of pure eagerness.

"You ready?" Tom asks with an incredibly child-like face. You grin.

"Sure am!>" Tom's grin widens as he kneels down to pick you up. You brace yourself as he lifts you up onto his shoulder, a lofty 25 feet in the air. You settle yourself as he ducks out the door, which you notice is a foot to low for Tom. Once outside, tom stands fully erect. You both smile into the wind. Tom towers over most homes, and you can see a brief look of hesitance in his face. another memory surfaces and you see most of the neighbors looking at a younger version of you and Tom with looks of discomfort. they were nervous having such large boys around. You rub his cheek. He glances down at you.

"It's alright tom," you say with a smile. "Let's just go have fun." Tom grins again, nodding to you. he puts his skateboard on the cement. As he skates with you on his shoulder towards the beach, you notice...

"Alright, alright, I'm going!" You yelled back quickly. You didn't care how humiliating it was- you were so terrified that would've said anything to get out from under there. His foot completely dominated your torso, and his big toe was comparable to your face. He wasn't not standing up, and as a result you couldn't see his face from the ground as his legs bent at the knees over five feet in the air and disappeared over a massive sofa throne.His foot relieved its pressure and settled down next to you with an ominous thud. You didn't even look back as you sprinted out of the room. You hear one final booming command from your titanic brother before you leave: "And make sure you bring my shoes with you! Hey Josh, get me a Coke..."

You slowed down as you walked to where you remembered the front hall of the house being, and then stopped suddenly when you entered. It was still a front hall, alright, but i was like you were in an entirely different house- a much larger, more expensive one. It must have been made for Jack's size, because everything was bigger. The ceiling vaulted almost thirty feet in the air, over an expansive wooden ground that almost seemed like a basketball court, and the door looked like it belonged in a cathedral, with massive wooden panels and a heavy-looking but shiny metal knob fitted into it. Below, level with the ground, another smaller door had been built into it, probably for normal-sized people. The overall look was somewhat comical, like a fancy dog entrance.

You recall that family policy had you taking off your shoes as you enter and putting them by the doorside. You saw that this has not changed either, though it certainly was stranger to look at. Next to you and your other brothers' normal 13 shoes lay Jack's sneakers, obviously custom-made, white with a dark-blue Nike swoosh on them and the size of trash cans. You bent over and briefly try tugging one up... and found that they were almost as heavy as fully-packed trash cans, too. Even when he had his foot on top of you, it hadn't given you a good impression of how strong your brother's size had made him. Now you had perspective. These shoes you were struggled with were weights he didn't even recognize. He donned them any time he walked outside.

You look to your right and see another massive door, slightly ajar and leading to what must be your brother's room. You shudder as you think about what Jack and his rotten personality could do with that kind of power.

choices: TRY to use your powers to diminish him
143122111.content:
Okay, so it was pretty interesting to change the world like this, at least in a kind of horror movie way. You certainly felt much more frightened now than you ever had while watching a movie! Of course, just like with a horror movie, there's a great sense of relief in knowing you can turn things off at any time. That's why it's fun to be scared.

Grabbing Jack's trashcan-sized shoes, you try to carry them back into the living room, but they're simply too unwieldy. You're forced to lug them in one at a time to your gargantuan giant of a younger brother. There is a smirk on Jack's handsome, billboard-sized face as he idly watches you sweat and strain to bring him his shoes.

"You're such a puny pipsqueak!" he sneers. "Better start lifting some weights, bug; I'm gonna need even bigger shoes soon. Now get going to my room."

Although you were curious about how Jack's room looks now, you don't really want to spend the rest of the day cleaning it, especially since everything in there is bound to be way too big for you to handle. You wonder how your life, and the lives of others, will be affected if you keep increasing Angel's size. She is already 7 feet tall, and the house had grown along with her to accommodate her now-huge form. However, you would like to see if anything else about your home will change in the event of the Husky growing beyond that size. In other words, you would like to experience life with a gigantic dog.

Using your powers, you start to steadily increase Angel's size, keeping your eyes on the two containers of growth-inhibiting pills that lie on the table a few inches away. The Husky lolls out her tongue as you further increase her size, her bowl, bed and number of dog food bags growing with her. When she reaches 10 feet, her pill boxes suddenly fuse into one. You pause her growth and examine the tub of supplements. On it is a label that proclaims that it is "the pill to stop your dog from becoming 'Zilla". Chuckling at the obvious reference to a certain Japanese monster, you turn back to Angel and resume her growth, except this time, you decide to speed it up. The dog quickly inches upwards, hitting the 20 feet mark in a matter of seconds, and then breaking the 50 feet barrier in another minute! The room you are in expands in height, length and width as the colossal dog gets bigger and bigger! You also notice that a dog house the size of a two-storey home now neighbours yours to the right, and even that is still expanding in size! Your eyes focus back on Angel, now 90 feet tall and growing still. Dissatisfied with her current size, you throw your hands up in the air. This causes a monumental surge in growth, in which the canine gains hundreds upon hundreds of feet in height. You finally stop her growth at an awe-inspiring one-and-a-half miles tall! She is now so big that even her paws tower over you.

You take a look at your surroundings, only to discover that your home is now a colossal mansion. The bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen and living room are now situated at the top of a broad, fairly steep staircase. Backing away from the intimidate form of Angel, you look around and spot a giant bone, far larger than ordinary. The shadow of the bone looms over you as you rub your hand on its surface. Just as you start pondering about where it came from, your eyes catch sight of the right side of the room. A fully functioning catapult stands dormant there, holding in its cup a tennis ball the size of a large boulder. Suddenly, it hits you: this large room is actually a play area for the dog, with the necessary objects being tremendously oversized, of course. Suddenly, you hear the voice of your mother calling you from the kitchen. "Billy," she says, "why don't you take Angel outside? She'd love some exercise."

What do you do?
144111.title: Life with a Giant Dog

choices: The universe changes massively, and you are now Angel's beloved tiny pet!
Angel goes through another round of growth, you've lost control of your power!
1441111.content:
"Okay, mum!" You shout in the direction of the kitchen. "I'm gonna take Angel on a walk!"

Looking up at the utterly titanic canine, you can't help but feel intimidated as your towering pet pants gently, the seven thousand nine hundred and twenty foot husky gazing down at you with the love only a pet could feel for their owner.

There was just one problem, though. How ere you going to do this? You couldn't see a collar and leash on Angel's scale anywhere; were you meant to just walk alongside her?

"Hey, Angel! Uh... Walkies?"

Angel instantly grows excited, and suddenly bounds off to a different part of the hypermassive mansion that was now your house. Several seconds later, miniature earthquakes and deep booms signify Angel's return, and she re-enters your field of view, a collar on her scale secured around her neck, a one and a half mile long leash dedfending from it to the ground, allowing you to grab it.

You gently scratch on one of Angel's paws. "Good girl... you're well trained, aren't you, girl?" Responding well to the praise, Angel lowers her sky-filling muzzle and opens her mouth, a massive tongue rapidly making its way towards you. Cringing as the tongue approaches, you are surprised to feel the texture of Angel's tongue when she licks you; it is similar to soft, if admittedly slobbery, velvet.

Gripping Angel's leash, you run into another problem. Your house had to be a few dozen miles long at the least, in order to contain Angel and offer enough space for her and your family to live comfortably. However, this problem seems to solve itself; before you can react, you are somehow caught harmlessly in Angel's jaws - something that should have pulverised every bone in your body within a millisecond - and tossed upwards, high into the air, coming down on the top of Angel's fluffy white head with a soft thump.

Struggling to explain the violation of pretty much everything you knew about biology, you are taken off guard when Angel starts to bound forward, her powerful legs allowing her to tear through the house towards her destination, the door. A massive doggie door, equal to Angel's one and a half mile scale, stands between Angel and her beloved walkies. A playful growl escaping her immensely thick throat, Angel leaps through the doggie door, emerging into the outside, whereupon she presses her muzzle to the ground and tilts her head upwards, allowing you to harmlessly roll onto the ground.

Looking around, you realise that immediately in front of your house is a titanic dirt path, stretching as far as you can see in both directions. On the opposite side of the road, twenty or so miles away, is another house, much like your own. This one, however, exceeds the scale of your own by a significant amount; it's almost twice as large! It seems Angel wasn't the only dog that got blown up and up and up to godlike sizes, and if what you were seeing was correct, she was by no means a particularly large dog.

Looking up into the cool blue sky, you are once again reminded of Angels sheer scale when most of your vision is filled with white fur.

"Alright then, Angel! Walkies!"

You begin to walk, grasping the leash as Angel waits, seemingly amused by your behaviour. Every now and then, the leviathan sized husky moves a single paw, shaking the earth as she creeps forward a fraction. It was slow, but it was fun. Angel seemed to be enjoying it even more than you.

Sitting within the fluff and fur of Angel's right paw, you can't help but feel... Slightly dizzy...

Actually, make that... Very dizzy...

Seemingly, it was, at least to some extend, working, given the building wasn't scaling up anymore. Rather, it started to *shrink*, unless it was you who was growing? You can't tell, given you couldn't have a peek outside the building.
Last when before you jumped onto the toy, it was 40 ft tall, but the roof seemingly was at around 75 ft tall, meaning that, since it was starting to strain onto the building's structure, you can only assume its bigger..

Thankfully, the roof needed reparations, given parts of it crumbles away, meaning you and the pooltoy would safely grow outside, at least, until you both started to get squeezed onto the roof's newly made hole.

More strangely enough, you were standing near your house, except there was a huge pool next to it, 50 ft, 550 ft long, and.. No idea, given you can't see how wide it is from your point of view.

Wanting to see what changed, and given you were *still* stuck, you, with extreme cautious, grow the building, making sure it doesn't affect you or the toy, and by just a tiny amount, so you can force your way onto the toy, and climb out, with it. You slide in the pool, and notices that.. The pool was actually a small aquatic ecosystem. Fishes, dolphins, sharks and others were found in it, wierder even, the pool was actually connected onto a river and toward the ocean. Your surroundings, that you somehow missed, were thoses of a shore. Next to the pool stand two computers. One for regulations and information, from what you could gather. The other one was a regular one, albeit bigger. Probably meant for you. A quick search on it tells you what occured to you.

After a day that you were at this beach, with your family, playing, all alongside other people, an abnormal decrease of water was occuring, alongside a dangerous storm that was whipping up, causing people to scurry off the place. During that, you were playing with your favorite pooltoy, the oversized inflatable dragon. Some enterprises were running interest tests onto huge pooltoys, to see their potential commercial value, and you, was one of the Lucky kids that won one. To 'test' it, your parents had brung you, the toy and the rest of the family at the beach. Unfortunaly, the flow of water had caught you, sending you away from the shore, with nothing but the pooltoy to hang onto.

Away in the ocean, as the storm transformed into a tempest, you get caught into a maelstrom and, would have drown, if it wasn't for the miraculous apparition of a water dragon, strangely similar to the toy. Still hanging dearly on the toy, the water dragon grabs you by the chest with its maw, as it lacked any other means to move you, and made you and your floater swim through the tempest, onto a calmer land.

1521.content:
You walk to the gorilla pen, going around the back where only employees are allowed and grabbing the gorilla feed stored there. Placing it in a wheelbarrow, you start wheeling it into the enclosure. The gorillas have come to like you over time, and you're allowed into the enclosure without any kind of safety gear. You wheel the food into the enclosure and head towards the back, away from the view of people who might be watching, and begin to distribute the food. Several gorillas appear and walk over to you, sitting together as they eat the food you've brought.

One gorilla in particular comes up closely, and tries taking food right from your hands. This gorilla is Kala, a young female with brown fur who bonded with you easily. You get a little annoyed by how much attention she gives you, as she frequently follows you and tries to play with you. As you watch her, though, you start to consider that she might be a prime candidate for using your powers, seeing as she is very friendly with you and likely won't hurt you, even when giant,

You raise a hand, palm facing the female ape, and concentrate. The gorilla looks around, seemingly feeling something weird, and lets out a series of surprised grunts as she suddenly grows in size. You watch as she grows bigger and bigger, soon looming over you. You stop once she's a few times your size, not wanting to overdo it, and grin as she glances around, intrigued by her new size.

You begin to hear loud grunts from behind you, though, and turn to see that the other gorillas have all grown too, each of them almost the size of King Kong. Apparently, your size changing power had a side effect. They are all looking around confusedly, though some start to glare down at you, seeming to think you're responsible for this change. You back up, fearing their wrath, when you bump into something warm and furry. You look up to see that you've bumped into Kala's now-massive arm, and she is looking right down at you... With a gentle look in her eyes.

Suddenly, you notice that she's moving up the arm you bumped into, and glance over your shoulder to see her giant hand coming up behind you. The human-like hand presses into you, palm pushing you forward slightly before the fingers curl around and wrap about your body firmly. Your arms are pinned to your sides as Kala snatches you up in her giant fist. Overtaken by fear, you start to squirm, but it's no use as the gigantic female ape lifts you off the ground and way up to her face, turning you around to look you in the eyes. You stare in fear at eyes the size of your head, and silently beg the beast to not hurt you.

You hear more grunts from behind you, and look over your shoulder to see the other gorillas are glaring at Kala now. To your surprise, the female gorilla tightens her grip on you and lowers you to her chest--awkwardly close to her bare breasts--and roars loudly at the other gorillas. Your ears are hurt, but not much, and you look back at the other gorillas to see them start to frown and turn away, moving away from Kala. Apparently, she was announcing her intention to protect you and her desire that the oer gorillas back ofd. The ground shakes with each step that the other gorillas take, and you suddenly realize that these gorillas could cause serious issues if left to roam.

You look up at Kala and order her to release you, but the female gorilla does not listen. She simply raises you to her face again and gazes at you, her eyes so gentle that you can't help but stop worrying for a bit. You start to wonder if you should even care about the other giant gorillas... Maybe you should just spend time with Queen Kong here, since she seems genuinely kind, and is almost certain to not hurt you...
1521.title: Kala becomes Queen Kong

1522221.content:
The force was just a bit too little for what you had wanted to do and now you saw why. The eagles were huge like you wanted, but so was their habitat and all the normal stuff, rather than make eagles big, you'd just made a single human smaller, a little under 3 inches, perhaps 2.5 or even two inches. When you'd thought mouse, you weren't too specific on breed and there were different types of mouse with different sizes.

You examined your environment and first off found that the aviary now expanded to include a huge set of seats for a crowd, like an aquatic arenas, and you were in the only break in the wall, on the opposite side as the crowd. On either side, concrete soared over head as a safety barrier, in front of you the opening was wide enough for a normal human to get through with ease. Yellow caution painting marked that it was a danger zone, do not cross, yada yada.
By your view around the bird in front of you, it seemed that the habitat had been sunken down a good fifteen feet so that the trees weren't so dense at eye level to the crowd.

After all the turning, you found something else changed. For starters, you were dressed in some sort of leather get-up like an indian might wear, it had a short-sleeve shirt top and shorts, but no shoes. Apparently clothes weren't made this small so something had to be made by yourself. Additionally, you had a tail! A frigging tail! Imagine being mouse-like and the size-change will work to fit your needs.

"Go on Billy!" a shrilly girl voice says from behind, at least normally shrill, now quite a deal deeper. Then there came a push that came at the lower half of your body, you turned and saw your eight year old cousin, but of course more like a titan than a 'little' girl.
1522221.title: Limited

15222212.content:
The titaness was holding onto metal handles in the wall far overhead, fearing a fall over the edge that was still a great distance away to you but very near to her. She seemed nervous about being at this edge but clearly wanted you to do something, otherwise she wouldn't have about bowled you over with... her... oh boy.

This whole time your view had been moving down her body and had just reached her feet which she had nudged you with a second ago. The rubber toe of her pink sandals was an inch tall normally and it came up to your chest, not much lower than your arm-pits and shoulders. Her toes stood above you, it took cranning your neck up to see the nails sticking just over the edge, while looking at them at all showed masses of dirt on and between the behemoths.

This settled it all, whatever breed of mouse you were based on, was a small laboratory type. A second later, the crowd started to cheer, "fly! fly! fly!" Something in this new body made you run forward, up the back of the bird and land in some sort of saddle amidst the soft feathers while grabbing reins sitting there. On a human - animal scale, the movement was faster than a human's on your scale and was somewhere between squierrel and mouse.

The eagle dwarfed you at almost the size of a football field, at 216ft long and its wings would easily clear that by far. Against it you were absolutely tiny, but yet when you kicked it, the beast obeyed, leapt forward and flew. Into the skies you soared, giving the crowd a show as you buzzed them, did loops and more to an announcer's narration. It was like being in an airshow with something the size of an airline but as manueverable as a fighter. It couldn't be explained, but the more you flew, the more you knew of this universe and of what you were doing.

"Who wants to touch an eagle!" the announcer called as you made another pass over the crowd, instantly everyone's hands shot up in a wave to stand out to you, a boy and girl by the front row rail were standing out at the moment. You guided the bird that way and while there weren't any cameras quite catching you (there were three huge screens getting close-up camera feeds), you slipped into the feathers and clung under the bird, totally hidden. From here, you guided the huge flyer into a landing on a metal railing right in front of the kids.

The titans immediately started to stroke the bird, their huge fingers quite larger and stronger than you moving all over the feathers. Eventually, a hand came to the chest and knocked you off, falling a few thousand feet, as you went some odd wings came out of your sides, and you landed safely. Then came the answer, your squirrely movements from earlier were of course some part flying-squrel. To get this small, the genetic mashup that was you, needed stuff from a squirrel and that gave you a flyers skin-wings.

You looked up at the huge kids, then the loud explosions of their bouncing feet brought you to a bigger problem, the iminent possibility of death. The two were as big as your cousin and in flipflops, they stood on their toes trying to get closer to the bird but every few seconds their feet wouldn't take the billion tons and dropped back down for a second. This left you barely above the bottom of the flip-flops and far shorter than the toes, trying to avoid getting crushed by things shooting 15 feet in the air in bounces every few seconds.

Now you knew what it felt like to be a bug in a kid's sights, what it was like to be one of the many tiny creatures that had been crushed under your feet throughout your life. You darted around like a rodent though, doing your best to avoid the crushed part. With the tons of foam shooting up and down though, it was hard to avoid it, yet at the same time you made out odd details like the blue image of the boy's footwear and the pink of the girl's or the massive black that coated the bottom's of their feet.
15222212.title: Shorter Flyer

152222121.content:
The giants continued to bounce around as they tried to pet the bird and eventually one of them shot out of the flip-flops and bounced barefoot over them and the floor. Without the couple tons, though feathers to the giant, he seemed to be bouncing higher and farther, then he got a lot closer.

Through this all, your memory of this world was appearing bit by bit, about now of all times it brought up your history and then a fact ran through your mind: fear = smaller you. Some combination of DNA and energy-field made you like you were, this mouse/squrrel form was one of many, but bigger forms needed some source of energy to expand with. Unfortunately, you'd never fully mastered your powers as enough fear gave size over to your subconcious and it started to morph you with smaller and smaller creatures.

The mountain toes in front of you had gotten a whole lot bigger in the past few seconds, you been taller than any of them, but now a single one filled your sights. The kid's bounces took him miles to your probably 1/16th inch self. As you backed up you found yourself standing in a black mark? It was a footprint from mud that had been under your feet! The mark of your little toe now dwarfed both you feet when you stood in it!

At this size, you couldn't dodge the titan toes much longer, if at all, every time they landed splayed wide you saw getting crushed or trapped between them.
152222121.title: Negatives of Powers

152222122.content:
With a whistle, you called the bird down to you. Its hearing far superior to any humans heard you and immediately dropped down, it scared the hell out of the kids, but made you feel better. A run, jump, grab and aboard the bird, it took off and brought about an escape.

With a final pass over the crowd, you headed up around and then through a whole in the wall to one of the many roosts. There the bird alighted and you got off to stand on a branch that might as well have been an 8 lane highway through the sky. A bit of memory from this world slipped into your head and it wasn't too pleasant as you realized you were substantially smaller now than earlier. Some combination of DNA and energy-field made you like you were, this mouse/squrrel form was one of many, but bigger forms needed some source of energy to expand with. Unfortunately, you'd never fully mastered your powers as enough fear gave size over to your subconcious and it started to morph you with smaller and smaller creatures.

There was a power source down below for growing, the question just was how you'd get there? Sure, the bird obeyed a mouse, but would it take orders from something smaller than most insects?
152222122.title: Free of one problem, on to another

1522222.content:
With a chill shooting down your spine, you found that there had in fact been more effort put into your work and for a very good reason, everything had changed! The city was gone, replaced by towering trees that would make any sky scraper seem a midget and down below the grass seemed two or three times your size as at the moment you stood on a rock perhaps 2000 feet tall.

Startled, by this, you looked at yourself and it wasn't much better looking. There was no sign of your shoes, you were scantily dressed with a cloak type thing made of leather and some sort of underwear made of the same material. The stone was absolutely freezing to your tiny feet, you sat down to get their black-dirtied bottoms off the solid ice but that only froze you butt too. With the freezing, their came another revelation, you had a tail! Apparently the focus on mice had managed to make the human race mouse-like.

Suddenly, the bird in front of you let out a wild caw, apparently it shared the thoughts about the mice-people...
1522222.title: Species - Mouse man!

1523.content: What about the dolphins or orcas?
1523.title: Other

153.content:
You have to feed the elephants first, so you grab the bags of feed and head there. It is always a hassle carrying around the bags of feed for them, given the weight and amount of feed.

You go inside the cage, and set up the food, and watch the elephants come out to eat. There are only three, two parents and a child, but what do you do?
153.title: Feeding the Elephants

choices: Go and check on the monkeys.
1531.content:
Before you leave you decide to have a little fun with the elephants. You remember the zoo owners discussing that the youngest elephant, named Omar, hasn't been growing as expected. Well, you can soon change that.

As the elephants happily begin to eat you picture Omar beginning to grow larger. He quickly begins to grow in size until he is almost twice as big as his parents despite not having aged at all. The elephant enclosure also enlarges to incorporate the newly sized Omar and the amount of food for the elephants doubles. Looking at how much there is you're glad you made the change after you brought the food out.

You feel slightly dizzy for a few seconds and after it passes you realize that your memory has changed slightly. Your memory of the zoo owners' discussion has now changed so that the owners were discussing building a bigger enclosure for the elephants since Omar was so big.

You smile at the thought of your power. You decide it's time you left the elephants to enjoy their meal now and you walk out of their enclosure.
1531.title: Omar.

choices: In the dusty janitor's closet of your high school.
154.content:
The tigers are ready for their daily feeding, and quite hungry. As you head over to them, carrying the bulk meat, it falls on the ground. You swear, stamp your foot, and clench your fist.

You have no idea how you have done it, but one tiger is prowling on the ground.. but is only the size of your middle finger! Afraid for its safety, you pick it up and set it in your shirt pocket.

The tigers are fed, and you are unsure of what to do with your new 'friend'. You save a small shard of meat and throw it in your pocket.

Once the rest of your work is done, you head to your car. You need to find a place to keep this tiger, unsure if you should resize it or not.

You decide to keep it..
154.title: Tigers

155.content:
You move over to the bears. You get the meat out, and begin to hide it all around the enclosure, when you get an idea

You look toward the largest bear and..
155.title: Feeding da bears

choices: You enter the bear enclave, and decide to shrink the bear
1551.content:
At almost 7' tall Bearnard was the biggest bear in the whole zoo. Yet you wondered if you could make it the biggest bear in the world. You focused on the gigantic mammal, and just tried to make him grow.

The animal didn't seem to notice something was happening to him. Neither the people at the zoo as the giant black bear rose to 8' tall, slowly speeding up his growth as he soon got to 10'. The whole zoo changed as the bear enclosure grew bigger to accommodate the massive animal. At 15' tall the bear's roars could be heard miles away. The bear area completely reinforced to prevent such a massive animal from escaping.

After growing the bear to 20' tall you realize it's your turn to feed Bearnard... You gulp as you wonder how much food is needed to satisfy the colossus.
1551.title: Increase its size

choices: Stay here and continue messing with them.
1552.content:
The bear had always been an ass to the rest of the bears, so you decide to shrink it. You concentrate on shrinking it. Slowly, it becomes smaller. You continue until it is about the size of a cub.

You stay and watch how things changed, and now, it gets picked on a lot, due to it being so small compared to the rest of the bears.

"Well, at least it knows how it feels now," you say to yourself. You lead it over to a steak that none of the bears found, and let it eat up.

Well, you are done feeding the bears, what do you do next?
1552.title: The Tables Turn

15521.content:
You decide to continue screwing with the bears. You single out a bear cub, who is the smallest compared to the other cubs, and bring him to a large bear. The large bear, as expected, acts tough and intimidates the small cub, until you concentrate on growing the cub. It slowly gains height, and the large bear changes its expression everytime a different benchmark is reached.

When the cub is the size of the bear, it looks like it is more friendly and casual with the cub, and the cub is still growing. You end its growth when it is twice as big as the large bear, who looks more intimidated than casual. In fact, the cub now is one of the most respected of the bears, aside from the oldest.

The enclosure now expands a bit, and the man-made caves are much larger, and the fencing is much taller as well. You decide to head off to your next duty, which happens to be feeding...
15521.title: Big Bear

15522.content:
Your next task was feeding all the big cats. Simple really, open the door, walk in, drop the meat and walk out. You head over to the habitats and first look in from the 30 foot tall walls to see if anyone's caring for the animals. It turns out there are, Jim's down there feeding the first patch of cat's, they were Lynxes or maybe Puma's, one of those wild cats. As you looked down, you saw Jim getting rough with the cats, he always did.

Jim was always a bully and you really didn't like him, so it was time to set him straight. As he stood in front of the cat, you concentrated on him looking up to see the creature's claws. Down below, he shriveled in size. Soon he was as tall as the feline, then he looked up at him like a horse, then he was looking up at a walking football stadium and at last you couldn't see him anymore but knew that the beast's claws were hovering over him by a vast distance.

Then, the changes hit the rest of existence and you to shrank. The cement walls of the habitats disappeared, most replaced by steel cages that reached miles into the sky. You'd shrunken the whole human race, but kept some of their dominance over the world. Habitat wall was there, still twenty feet to you, it wasn't even high enough to see the toes, just look out at their pads and a ceiling of fur overhead. The creatures were held in by a steel fence that was the same as they were before you'd shrunken to them and miles wide between each piece of metal to you.

Out in the cage, Jim was in no position to be rough with the cats now. There were the huge binocular things all around the cage, you went to one and looked in at him all those miles away. He was in front of a toe looking up 300 feet to see the tip of a claw, a distance that had been perhaps an sixteenth to a thirty-second of an inch before. The cat was looking down and showing its teeth, which were just enormous, bigger than sky scrapers. You weren't sure if the behemoth could hear him, but it seemed bent on attacking something.

Suddenly, your view goes black. Looking with your eyes rather than the scope, you saw a titan lynx's toes tower overhead of you at the edge of the cage. She was a huge girl and totally eclipsed your view of the whole habitat.
15522.title: Check your next task.

155221.content:
There's a sudden shaking, you turn to see a normal sized kid towering overhead and trying to get as close to the fence as he can. His towering barefeet are miles tall and nearly throw you in with the lynxes. Quickly you run from him but only encounter more, but none are much older than their teenage years. There's not much of their bodies you can see all those miles up, though you see that many are barefoot, others have some sort of shoes, its quite variable.

You dodge them as you run for some sort of cover, and eventually find it. Your hide out is a storage shed with a lot of monitoring computers, and THE INTERNET! Quickly you look up a history of the world and find that you've changed human genetics. Babies started on this scale but rapidly grew until they were big like the other kids, they stayed like that until puberty and the teen years, then they began to shrink. The giants lived mostly on their own, not meeting parents until their teen years. Awareness among them of the tiny people was varied. A handful were quite aware and helped, others didn't know. Their clothes were whatever hand-me-downs they could find and whatever the little people produced and left for them.

On the monitors, you see a teen out there who's the target of the Lynx's rage, he's just barely able to touch the top of the toes, so it doesn't speak well for him. LIttle Jim far below is meanwhile scrambling up the titan teen for seafety. Can they escape?
155221.title: The big people

1552212.content:
The two were not going to escape the cat, not by a long shot. There was a dilema here for you, save them or continue to enjoy this particular universe? Ultimately, you decided to save them, but in a different way. You figure by shrinking them, most of this universe will remain unchanged. Looking at both creatures on the screens, you imagine them becoming nearly microscopic, too small for the feline to find.

It worked, to an extent. The two inside the cage would see an inch as an absolutely massive distance, the feline so distant to them that neither could see much more than blurred colors of him. You and the city however, all grew, you looked out and down into the habitat as you had before, except now, all the habitats had been merged together into one big habitat, meeting the needs of all the species in it with varied conditions all over to support them. From your shack, now with windows and such, but still with computers, you find the history for this universe...

About 80 years ago, alien life found Earth. They were in a way, tree huggers and would not permit the Earth's natural life to be wiped out by man. By force and negotiation, an agreement was reached. Humans would be given materials necessary to survive and build, but would not be permitted outside of their cities. Going anywhere near a natural environment requires a reduction in your threat to it, that reduction was done by shrinking. Any cities outside designated areas were shrunken and arranged at that size out of the way. The only people normal sized outside the urban centers were those deemed to innocent to intend harm, which was determined by the shrinking machines. Those considered innocent would either be left as they were or altered into an anthromorphic form to ensure survival. With zoos, the habtats were deemed to be too dependent on humans and thus modified to be self-sustaining.

This was yet another interesting world, and given the odds of you getting the other back were almost nonexistant, your going to explore the areas that have changed...
1552212.title: Alien Management

15522121.content:
Curiosity has the best of you, your gonna see the outside world, a nature without polution of any kind. Albeit, your not going alone. For curiosity and some laughs, you grab your little brother Tom, just to see if he's deemed safe for the environment. He was rotten to you whenever he got the chance, surely he was a problem, at least so you kept telling yourself.

At the airlock to leave the city, your in separate chambers, both have their own exit outside. Stepping into yours, the doors seal automatically and immediately lights begin to blink and flash around you. Overhead and in front a monitor shows the analysis of your brain, you've been considered a threat. Within seconds you begin to shrivel into nothingness, its like falling off a thousand mile tall building. When at last it finishes, the walls beyond are a defocused blur.

Looking down, you find that everything you'd been wearing was replaced with leather AND that you were anthromorphic, a cat of some sort. Before you can step forward, there's a flash of light and what you presume to be a transporter of some kind sends you beyond the walls. After the transport, your vision is remarkable and nothing seems all that far from focus. Then you wish it was blurred as you recognize an ant and watch it walk over you a perhaps 3000 foot climb to its body. Which meant 2 millimeters was 3000 feet and that an inch would be 37500 feet.

There's a booming hiss from behind you, turning you see the chamber doors open for your brother, so he didn't shrink. Quickly, you figure the math for just how big he is now, you repeat the math but are not happy as its the same, 320 miles tall....

Out of the door, you see a...
15522121.title: Outside of the city...

155221211.content:
From out of the city, you see your 'little' brother's enormous flip-flopped foot. There you looked up his immense form, to him an Earth on your scale a football field, taking just minutes to reach any point on the globe. To throw salt on the wound, he was in human form. Older and with a boost of strength from feline creatures, you were nothing next to him and dubbed unfit to survive on your own.

Looking up the massive creature, you consider approaching and climbing him or otherwise getting his attention. Over the years you'd pulled quite the deal of pranks on him, but now he had a chance for payback. Of course when every 2 milimeters is 3000 feet, you didn't have much chance of covering any distance or surviving on your own. It would take you a week to venture just a few inches into the forest, with Tom that distance was a million miles to you.

At last, you yell, "Hey, Tommy! Down here!"
155221211.title: Foot

1552212112.content:
Of course he didn't hear you. How could he, when you were almost the size of a germ compared to him. Tom, meanwhile, was looking around, trying to find you. Had he forgotten that the machine could shrink people?

You were trying to come up with another plan to get his attention when Tom took a step forward, his foot landing less that a hundred feet away from you. Winds stronger than any hurricane on Earth blew you high into the air, your miniscule body blown about by even the faintest breeze, eventually bringing you to rest right between Tom's first two toes.

You look up in awe at the titanic toes. The big toe was easily as tall as Mount Everest, and the second one was not far behind. That these monstrous things were only some of the smaller body parts of your younger brother impressed on your mind just how insignificant you were next to him. How could you possibly manage to get his attention at this size? You might as well try to drain great lakes with nothing but a spoon.

Suddenly, a tremendous noise coming from far above interrupts your thoughts. Looking up, you see your brother pressing some buttons on his watch, which were making a loud beeping noise when pressed. Pretty soon he finishes with whatever he was doing and then the same beeping noise, but not as loud, starts coming from your wrist. You raise your arm up to your face and find that you were also wearing one of the same wrist watches as Tom was. Only it isn't really a wristwatch, it's something much more advanced than any technology from your original timeline.

There is a message on the screen, from Tom, asking you where you are. You type out a reply – "I'm between your toes, Tom" – and hit send. Tom's device beeps once to indicate that he received your message. Your brother reads it quickly, the he crouches down and begins inspecting his feet with the device. He finds you in hest to no time and lets out a giggle.

"Haha! Look at you, Bill! You're absolutely tiny!" Tom's voice booms down at you. "I mean, you're like a speck of dust compared to me! You could get crushed from one of my hairs falling on you!"

You wince at your brother's crude reminder of your fragility. You write him a message saying, "Tom, quit messing around and get me somewhere safe." Tom looks at his device and back to you. "Aww, are you scared? Don't worry, Bill. Your big, strong brother Tom is here to protect you from those monster cats and squirrels. Though the way you are now, maybe the cats would just take you in as one of their own, eh kitty?

A cat-like growl escapes your lips, surprising you from how unexpected it was. You're glad your brother couldn't hear it, or else you might have died from embarrassment. "Anyway," Tom continues, "what do ou say we get going?"

How does Tom carry you?
1552212112.title: Brotherly Teasing

155221212.content:
There's a flash of movement, a cloud of dust and a resounding boom, you look up to see your 'little' brother as a tiger/human hybrid. You look up his body, starting with the toes, normally 2-3 inches tall and then along up the digitgrade leg structure and eventually spot his head. His clothes are leather as well, but he's not as thoroughly dressed, your in pants and a shirt, he's got shorts and a big baggy shirt. There is of course, a reason, little you is a lot less protected from the elements than big him.

"Hey, Tommy, over hear!" you yell up to the giant, running at his towering toes with the intention of scaling him. Being out here, he's the fastest and safest way to go anywhere so far as your concerned. He's stronger than you now and than you were as a human, now that he's got the tiger genetics on his side, to you, nothing would dare attack such a force. Tiny little thing you are though, have cause to fear a bug's legs and are easily ended by just about anything in existence...
155221212.title: Titan Tiger Boy

1552212121.content:
Overhead, Tom just hears you, your surprised at this but it could be good none the less. In a flash, he's bending down looking and listening for you. This gives you a close up of his teeth, something like seven miles tall for the front fangs and between three and five for the rest, that was just plain scary. After they passed though you saw him with some sort of computer-enhanced glasses, displaying something on the lenses. Now you weren't so sure it was a good idea to be found.

From the distance, a wall reaches to the sky, it closes in and spreads into five. At the end of each there's an inch long claw, more like 8 miles long that to a titan comes to a sharp point, to you, its a dull, flat, point. You turn and run as fast as your tiny tiger body will take you, but when the giant can move 300 miles in under a second without a bit of effort, your not going to escape him. "Come on, 'big' bro" Tom booms, a second before your thrust into darkness. When the light returns, your on a mountain of dirt on his center palm pad. "Guess its little bro now. I got ya' course', with those puny claws and limbs you couldn't hurt a fly. I'll just step on em'."

There's a lot of things you wanna say to the 'big' brother, but you don't wanna risk taking a 200 to 300 mile drop or any of the cruel things he could do now. Payback would come later. The hand continued to move and over the left arm turned to dump you on a continent of fur. After miles of falling you it down on semi-soft skin, though it was more like concrete, still though, you survived. Standing, you found yourself on Tom's upper arm, his massive muscles under you pulsing a bit as his arm moved.

Tom took off at a run, to him, average for a young tiger. In his fur, the micro-you took cover behind one of the towering strands for cover from the wind. You saw what of the forest you could, but when 12 to 14 mile tall fur barred you view in all directions, it was hard to see anything.
1552212121.title: He hears you

15522121212.content: After hours and hours of running, Tom at last stops at...
15522121212.title: A destination

choices: The world gets bigger, but tom doesnt?
155221212121.content:
Ahead, Tom stopped in front of a 4 inch long metal object on the ground as flat as a CD. Walking onto a strand of fur going over his side you look down and see its a CITY! There were actually people crazy enough to come out here like that and live so small a bug could end their city. Really, Tom could crush it underfoot and it might not take up all of his center-pad.

You wonder why he stopped here... Your goal was to see the world...
155221212121.title: Micro-city

1552212121211.content:
Looking around, you see everything is suddenly getting bigger, except Tom, he's still exactly the same. Panicing, you look all around in search of why your both shrinking, you were already more than small enough. After looking down, you see it, two white paw-prints in the dirt, just bigger than your brothers and they were glowing! He was entering the city and hadn't puut you down!

At the end of the process, you were incomprehensibly small. One of the tiny people was massive and a normal person? Forget it. Someone normal was 300 miles to Tom and he was already 300 miles to you. A normal inch was now 3 million miles for you. Your other two brothers would dwarf the solarsystem now just starting at a toe, heck your skating shoes back in the city would hold the solarsystem.
1552212121211.title: One big city

choices: Back to your original size, with a friend in your brother's fur with you.
Stuck in the fox's fur, about to get lost on your younger brother's paw.
15522121212111.content:
Tom roars with laughter as he steps into the city, throwing his arms around the young fox he meets there. Your view is momentarily obscured as russet colored fur crashes down into the black and orange forest you're already stranded in.

"Les! God I feel like I haven't seen you in ages!" Tom laughed as he threw an arm around the fox's shoulders, letting the slender vulpine guide him through the gate.

The fox grinned at that, his bushy tail swishing as he looks back up at the taller tiger. "That's because you haven't been visiting. I thought your parents banned you from coming out here anymore."

That's when the memories started rushing in, synapses jumpstarting to fill in experiences you've never before had. There were entire cities out here, in the wilderness that had been abandoned in the great reduction, left to crumble when the humans moved into the protective enclosures. Alot of the younger teens used them, against common sense and their parent's wishes, as club houses and gathering spots. You're lost for several long moments in your own thoughts, so much so that you've missed a great deal of their conversation, as it was already hard to make out and understand those impossibly deep voices.

"God, man. I wish you could stay longer." The fox almost whined, his ears folding back as he looked up at Tom. "You know I'm not allowed in the city. I'm a 'troublemaker'."

"Well," Tom smirked, wrapping his arms around his friend in a hug that buries you in their conjoined fur again, miles long strands of fur flattening you between the impossibly soft, pliant pillars. "I just learned, thanks to my brother, that there's ways to get around security. You could always come back as a tiny. He's on me right now and y'all didn't even know."

The fox gasps, laughing as his ears perk. "Oh my god. That would be awesome! Get me inside and then unshrink me after the alarms won't be scanning. Dude. Let's do it!"

With a grin, the two separate from their friendly hug, the already huge tiger striding back to the portal to scale back up to titanscale while the fox takes the other exit. Within moments, the tiger is 320 miles in height again, the fox scrambling through the barren plateau of cool dirt beyond the expansion pad to reach his toes safely.

Meanwhile, you're trapped in the dense, soft white chestfur of one of the two anthrofurs. . .
15522121212111.title: Titans' fun in the city

choices: You and Les grow back to normal, but Tom grows too!
It doesn't work, and you must find some other way to get bigger.
155221212121111.content:
As you try to make your way through the forest of what you soon realize is your brother's fur, you see something moving through the tall white strands in front of you, and you make your way towards that, hoping it's your brother's friend. Sure enough, it turns out to be Les.

"Hey!" his eyes light up when he sees you. "Glad you're here! Nice to have a traveling buddy, if you know what I mean." He nudges you with his elbow.

"Yeah," you mumble, unsure of what's going on and what to say. "So, we're taking you into the city, right?"

The young fox nods. "Yep."

"Okay, but why exactly aren't you allowed in the city on your own? Why do we have to be all sneaky?"

Les's ears droop in embarrassment, and he turns his gaze away while a slightly embarrassed grin cross his face. "Well," he starts, "Let's just say that the last time I was in an occupied city, I sort of played around with one of the shrinking devices, and hacked it into shrinking down a bunch of cops. I didn't kill them though!" His eyes went wide in a defensive gesture. "I just played with them for a little while." He grins and you shake your head. Kids these days.

After a short walk, Tom has reached the city, and passes through the security check without any alarms going of or anyone noticing the two tiny passengers on his chest fur. Once inside, he ducks into an alley and sticks out his paw, letting you and Les climb onto his thumb.

"Okay," his voice booms overhead. "Now what?"

"Unshrink us!" Les cries out.

You wonder if your brother can even hear him, but apparently his honed tiger ears can tune in what must be the insignificant squeaks of the fox. "And how do I do that?"

Les stares up at him, dumbfounded. "Uhhh…"

You smack your face with your paw. "You mean you don't have a plan on how to get bigger?"

"Well…" Les nervously shifts from foot to foot.

"Fine," you say, shaking your head. Concentrating, you try to see if you still have the size-changing power at your disposal.
155221212121111.title: Flying Without Much of a Plan

info.brief_description: You are Billy, and you have just acquired the power to change the universe, with size.
info.description:
1)Keep it clean. No bathroom, swallowing, or anything sexual. Mild violence is allowed, but nothing too harmful, and definitely nothing lethal.

2)State how the universe changes when something is grown. Doesn't have to be large scale, just something. I guess to put it simply, try to explain why something is the new size, and how it affects the surroundings.

3)Add characters as you feel, just if it is a friend, don't have them attacking the main character. The only exception is family members, as I have pretty much covered all of them.

4)This is Shrink/Grow only. Age change is allowed for how it affects the universe, just no weight gain. The concept bothers me. EDIT: If you want, you can directly change age, just hold back a bit on it.

5)Yes. Clothing changes as well. It doesn't mean a 2000 foot giant has to be wearing normal clothes, just have him wearing something.

6)Finally, The main character is generally unaware of the change made, until he sees it or hears of it. So, that means he himself won't know how something happened, or what it has done.

Anyways, to the story: You are Billy, a 15 year old male, and one night, you gain the ability to change the size of objects, people, creatures, anything, and even turn inanimate objects into living breathing creatures. (More toy animal wise, and doll wise.

Oh yeah, an example as well:

You grow your house, and you, your family, and everything in the house grows, as well as the property size.

Or say, you grow a toy bear to 10 feet, and you turn it real, then the change would be that the bear is not only a giant bear due to something like growth formula or birth defect, but it is also your pet bear.

Alright, to those who are adding, let me make it clear: No one knows that you have this power except you. Whenever a change is made, no one notices because to them, things had always been that way. I appreciate the additions, but please follow the basic idea of this story. I'm not going to edit anything, but for future reference, stick to the basic idea of the story.
